name: mwhite3064
text: Dr. Stubbs is an excellent doctor, explained diagnosis and treatment. Happily answered all questions,  explained recover time and precautions afterwards.

resp.text: Thank you - we appreciate the five star feedback!

name: Bonita Crist
text:
Dr.  Determann and his staff are caring and take time to listen to me and then set up a plan to fix my problem. They all make me feel like they really care. I have been going to him for 2 years.
Dr D keeps putting me back together and I  would not consider going anywhere else.

resp.text: We're always here to "put things back together" when you need us - thank you for the kind words Bonita!

name: Angie Bacon LoPresti
text: From the first time I met with Dr. Determan, over 5 years ago I was thoroughly impressed with his knowledge, demeanor and caring attitude. I’m almost 4 years post-op for a knee replacement and could not be happier. I have all the faith and trust in him as a doctor one should have. I highly recommend him for all one’s Orthopaedic needs.

resp.text: Thank you Angie -  our patients become like family along the healing process. Glad to know your new knee has you back to doing the things you love!

name: Monique Rogers
text: Everyone at Bayside Orthopedic was very courteous and professional. I definitely rate my overall experience 5 ⭐ ⭐⭐⭐⭐ My husband and I absolutely loved the Christian atmosphere. Even though the AC was out, we barely noticed that.😊 The receptionist told us only one physician was there and I may not be able to be seen. That was very disheartening because we had drove for over an hour from Mobile. She checked and Joshua Wing, CRNA, graciously agreed to see me.🙌🏾 Brian the X-ray technician made sure to take as many x-rays as possible to get the right angles of my knee. Brian was super nice and professional. What can I say about Joshua Wing? He was very caring and professional. He provided excellent service. Joshua was very thorough in his examination and  explanation of my x-rays. He was very caring and concerned about my knee pain and discomfort. He provided my husband and I with various suggestions and treatment options. And he gave a detailed explanation of knee replacement surgery. Joshua raved about the excellent physicians at Bayside. Joshua assured us a plan would be put in place to get my surgery scheduled as soon as possible. My husband and I truly appreciated Joshua's knowledge and professionalism. Joshua truly blessed our day. 🙏🏽

resp.text: Thank you for the detailed and thoughtful feedback Monique - your thoughts let us know whether we’re meeting your expectations and our own standards for patient care.  Brian and  Josh are stellar - you were indeed in the best of hands.  Grateful to have you in the Bayside Ortho family… and look forward to getting you on the mend!

name: Angie Janes
text: Josh was just great- knowledgeable, personable, and easy to relate to. He explained the process for my knee injections very well. Injections were almost painless!  Thanks Josh!

resp.text: Thank you Angie - glad to know we’ve got you on the mend!

name: Gina Gillott
text: As always, a great experience at this practice! Dr. Deaterman & Jennifer are so kind and are very patient with my questions. Wouldn’t go anywhere else!

resp.text: Thank you for that feedback Gina - it takes a team every step of the way toward great patient care!  Grateful to have you in the Bayside Ortho family.

name: Janice Kinard
text: I arrived early and did not have to wait more than 10 minutes.  Dr. Carter is very thorough is determining what is wrong.  I feel he always listens to my concerns.  I have been using Dr. Carter for 25 years and would not see anyone else.

resp.text: Thank you Janice - we’re grateful to have you in the patient family all these years!

name: pamela jiovenetta
text: She was very calming.  I was nervous.  She explained everything. Made sure I was ok checking me. I would have her do the procedure again. Her prep nurse was calming also.  Made sure I knew everything the Dr was going to do. 👏.

resp.text: Thanks Pamela!

name: Tom Christy
text: Dr. Joanne Baird is by the best of the best in her field. You will not find a more qualified doctor and her true concern for your quality of life. I am 64 and been going to doctors all my life being actively involved in sports, knee surgeries, etc. My first visit and my knee feels so much better. I would strongly read her profile online, she has a great bedside manner to make you feel at ease when you are miserable with pain. I wish all doctors regardless of specialty, had her genuine concern for your well being. Cancel your other appointment and call her office, you will find that you wished you went to her a long time ago.

resp.text: Thank you for that thoughtful feedback Tom.  We agree, Dr. Baird is distinguished in not just her remarkable credentials but warm approach to each and every patient.  We're glad to have her with us - and grateful to have you within the patient family!

name: Sherie Gore
text: I love, love, love Dr Determann and his staff!! Dr Determsnn is a good Christian man with a great bedside manner. He loves his job and it shows in how he treats his patients. Everyone from x-ray techs to nurses to receptionists have treated me, not only with respect, but with care and concern. I'm almost sad I don't need him anymore. I, absolutely, recommend him, 150%.

resp.text: It takes a team - and we have a great one every step of the patient journey. Thank you for those kind words Sherie!

name: Stanette Miller
text:
First time to see this physician, but have used this group before.
Dr. Stubbs was great.  He was not aggressive with a treatment plan,
and his personality was exactly what I needed.

resp.text: Thank you Stanette - just what we hope to hear!

name: Ann DeBrule
text: Jennifer is great. Will answer all your questions and make sure you understand. Over many months she has guided me thru steroid shots and the latest visits the "rooster" shots. Thanks for your help.

resp.text: We appreciate the five stars - thank you Ann!

name: Georgie Cain
text: Excellent physician. Explained situation in detail with clear plan of care and follow up. Did not have to wait very long to be seen.

resp.text: Thank you Georgie - we appreciate the five stars! Always our goal.

name: Cristol Thompson
text: Excellent professional service. Had rotator cuff surgery and have absolutely no complaints. I would highly recommend Dr. Determan and his staff!

resp.text: So glad you're on the mend Cristol - thank you for the kind words!

name: Matt Drouillard
text: We trust Dr. Savage completely. He successfully reconstructed our daughter’s ankle after numerous dance-related injuries. He is a top notch surgeon with a great bedside manner. Highly recommended!

resp.text: We appreciate the kind words Matt - and glad we've found relief for your daughter. Always here when you need us!

name: Benita Harris
text:
Dr. Savage is one of the most friendly, bedside manner, Concerned, doctor you ever want to meet. I continually telling family and friends, and stranger about him. If you need a GOOD Well experience Orthopedic doctor He's the one to call. Dr. Savage operated on my right knee giving me a total knee replacement, he's done a fantastic job I am very pleased.  I will give Him 5 stars he deserves more. Awesome Doctors At Bayside Orthopaedic Sports and Medical.
Signed,
Benita A. Harris

resp.text: Thank you for that thoughtful feedback Benita - we believe taking time with each and every patient is essential to care and recovery. It's a partnership - and we're grateful to have you in the patient family!

name: Angela Long
text: We have always been pleased with services here. They are timely and very friendly and knowledgeable.  We highly recommend Dr. Savage and Jennifer Firestone.

resp.text: Thank you Angela - we're grateful to have you in the patient family!

name: Brandolyn Cote
text:
Dr. Stubbs is great and knowledgeable. Very personable and great manner. Over the years we have seen a few doctors in this practice at both locations and have always had good interactions with each. The nurses are all friendly too.
The only downside to our recent visit was the receptionist as it seems she forgot her customer service skills this morning, no eye contact and spoke down to us more than once.

resp.text: Thank you for that valuable feedback Brandolyn  - as it's essential to know whether we've met not only patient expectations but our own commitment to their care.  We'll ensure your next visit meets that goal!

name: Stacey Sexton
text: Everyone we encountered was outstanding.  Dr Determann was very patient and personable. He took time to really listen and explain everything very well. Would definitely choose him again! Great experience.  Highly recommend.

resp.text: thank you Stacey!

name: Michael Velaski
text: Jennifer was extremely polite & knowledgeable. Overall my appointment was a great experience.

name: Bill Wallace
text: Jennifer was through in testing my left knee for the cause of the pain I'm experiencing. Talked in layman's terms that I was able to understand. Xrays and knee manipulation with orders to my PT clinic has set me on a path to recovery.

resp.text: So glad you’re on the mend Bill - we appreciate the kind words!

name: Krista Lippold
text: Efficient practice and kind people. Dr Stubbs explained everything very well and offered a large variety of treatment options. As it has been said.. people don’t care how much you know.. until they know how much you care.  I truly appreciate being sincerely cared for during my visit.  Thank you

resp.text: We couldn't ask for a great endorsement of what we do and how we do it.... thank you Krista for those very kind words!

name: Carolyn Hare
text: Dr. Determann was thorough, explained things to my husband about the condition of his knee, and offered good advice. Also, pleased with how we were in and out in 45 minutes.

resp.text: Thank you for the thoughtful feedback - glad to know we got you on the mend !

name: P L
text: Jennifer was very helpful and informative and answered all my questions and concerns

resp.text: Many thanks for the five stars!

name: Gracie Weston
text: Made me feel so comfortable and like I was already known. Staff took good care of me and dr Stubbs really helped.

resp.text: Thank you Gracie!

name: Judy Ullrich
text: Dr Jay Savage is THE best...caring, knowledgeable, skilled surgeon.

resp.text: Thank you Judy!

name: Karen Walton
text: Dr. Detterman has always been great in handling the ortho issues I have had. He is so friendly and conversational - not stuffy or standoffish or dismissive. Knowledgeable but not arrogant. I highly recommend Dr. Detterman for orthopedic needs.

resp.text: Medical care shouldn't be overwhelming - we take time to ensure your questions are answered and concerns heard. We're glad to have you in the patient family!

name: Gwen Taylor
text:
I came from MS, for a second opinion, and was pleasantly surprised about how friendly, respectful and knowledgeable this group has been to me. I met with Dr. Terrall once and immediately felt comfortable  and less stressed. Even making an initial appointment was easy and the staff was cheerful.
I then had my “rooster”shot given to me per Josh Wing, CRNP, and knew this was a special group. I felt no pain and he talked me thru the injection and answered all my questions. This has been nothing but a positive experience for me and I will sing their praises for a long time.

resp.text: We appreciate the kind words Gwen - glad we were able to provide the treatment direction and relief  you were seeking.  Glad to have a Mississippi face in the patient family!

name: Mike LeCroy
text: Great communication with not just me but my 10yr old. He made sure we both understood what was going on with her knees and what we could do to help them. It’s great to have a doctor take time with their patients.

resp.text: Thank you Mike - glad your daughter is on the mend!

name: Susan Martin
text: Jennifer was wonderful!  A thorough examination and determination of what my problem was!  She explained everything in detail and gave wonderful advice!  Would highly recommend her as a practitioner!

resp.text: Jennifer is one of our most experienced NP team members - from trauma to burn care and specialized certification in bone health & osteoporosis care.  Thank you for sharing your experience Susan!

name: Darlene Smith
text: I find Dr. Carter and Laura to be extremely professional and caring.  I believe I receive exceptional care each time I go to Bayside Orthopedics.  There can’t possibly be any care any better!

resp.text: thank you Darlene!

name: Sherie Gore
text: I had a great experience. I was a new patient and they made me feel part of the family. The doc showed me my X-rays and explained what was happening in my hands and what we could do about it. I left with a plan and am on the road to pain free hands!!

resp.text: Glad we could sort things out with your hands Sherie - and welcome to the family!

name: Michele Frost
text: Dr Baird is the female Dr. to avoid here. She saw me for five minutes to show me an x-ray of my hips which I’ve been having pain in and wrote  me off to the bone density Clinic who then informed me that the pain I’m having in my hips most likely stems from the curve in my spine that was noticeably overlooked by her but highly visible in the x-ray.  Any five minute doctor should be avoided at all costs.  And I do not need to see anyone at Bayside on this. I reported the issue and received NO CALL BACK.

resp.text: Michele, we regret the experience you’ve described as meeting neither your own expectations nor our own standards for patient care and communication.  We would welcome the opportunity to discuss any questions or additional concerns from your recent visit by calling and speaking to Kirby Butler: 251.210.3114

name: Crystal Gonzalez
text: Dr. Carter operated on my shoulder and did a fantastic job!! He called my husband before and after the surgery to keep him updated. He answers any and all questions or concerns you have. I've used this office since I was 10 years old. Back then it was Dr. Fellers. I've also seen Dr. Terrell. Highly recommend this office to everyone.

resp.text: Crystal - caring for Baldwin County more than 40 years gifts us with longtime members of our patient family like you.  Grateful to have you with us all these years - and for the continuing kind words.  Glad your shoulder is doing well!

name: Donna Brown
text: Dr. Carter is always reassuring and encouraging.  I would recommend him and his team to everyone. They all know what they are doing.

resp.text: We appreciate those kind words - thank you Donna!

name: Matthew Conklin
text: I've had nothing but great expereinces in their office. The staff is friendly and takes pride in their work. Dr. Carter does a wonderful job explaining everything and and is dedicated to his patients' well-being.

resp.text: Thank you for sharing that feedback on not only Dr. Carter but our entire time. We strive for a common culture throughout the office based on a welcoming sense of patient care. Glad to have you in the patient family Matthew!

name: Ruth Lazzari
text:
Dr.Joey, had been my Dr. for years.
He not only does his job well.
But more than that ,he is a true friend. And cares about you. I am blessed to have him .

resp.text: We appreciate those five stars Ruth - grateful to have you in the patient family all these years!

name: Brian Sinclair
text:
Wonderful experience with Bayside Orthopaedic Sports Medicine and Rehab Center. Dr. Determann was a wonderful surgeon, and the staff was always helpful and kind. I am so glad I chose Bayside Orthopaedic and would highly recommend to anyone.  I appreciated Dr. Determann taking time to go over my diagnosis and his willingness to listen and discuss my treatment options not only to me but while also educating his residents in how to diagnosis and treat shoulder issues.  A testament to his passion to educate, train,  and heal others!
The physical therapists were wonderful to work with and they will work as hard for you as you work for them while taking your pain levels into consideration and ensuring you do not work outside your physical capabilities of the injury.

resp.text: Thank you for that thoughtful feedback Brian - you've described exactly the benefit of having such a comprehensive physical therapy team on site at our Fairhope clinic. Our surgeons are able to coordinate directly with PT staff in planning a recovery plan unique to your injury and needs.   Dr. Determann is our shoulder go-to... you're in the best of hands!  Glad you're on the mend - and grateful to have you in our patient family.

name: Sybil Lindell

text: I highly recommend Bayside Orthopedic Group. Our first visit was two months ago when my 7 year old son broke his elbow... and again this week after a broken leg. Dr. Stubbs has great communication with not just me but my 7 year old as well. He made sure we both understood what was going on with his elbow and leg. Even called the day after his surgery to check in on him! The office staff has been friendly and helpful anytime I have called. They are always on time for appointments but leave plenty of time to explain or answer any questions. It’s great to have that time and not feel rushed with unanswered questions. Dr. Stubbs and Kristen both have been wonderful through all of this and have had all the patience in the world to deal with the drama from my 7 year old. From the nurses, to the x-ray people, everyone has been so amazing. And I have to give a big thank you to Evan for taking time out of his busy day to work with Trey on using his crutches. He was fantastic. Bayside has been a blessing to our family.  We have always been treated with the upmost care and respect.

resp.text: Our youngest patients are extra special, as we realize both children and parents need a unique level of reassurance in diagnosis and treatment plans... not to mention time to ask questions and plenty of encouragement. Crutches are awkward at every age!   Hope that elbow and leg are mending well - we're sorry for the bumps but grateful to have you and Trey as part of our own patient family.  Will pass along your kind words to Dr. Stubbs and team!

name: Tracie Reeves
text:
My husband has had two compound fractures in two separate accidents.  We went to The Falcons Sports Ortho in Atlanta.  Three different ones here in Alabama...one of which is extremely famous for sports figures...They never caught the problem on x-ray.  The hardware was literally falling apart due to non growth of bone.
Finally we were referred to Dr Determen.  He immediately diagnosed.  He did surgery on my husband...David Owen....He took old hardware out of the arm and replaced it .  He took bone graft from my husband's hip packed it to his bone in elbow.  Few scars....perfect healing...small downtime...and he uses his arm wonderfully today.  It took four years to find Dr. Determen and we are forever grateful!   His staff and rehab is Amazing.  Bone growth is amazing!  We thought he would lose use of his arm.  This is an Amazing Ortho Doctor.   I hope he gets honored and lives well for all he does.  Another thing...he treats you well...very personable...finally trust!

resp.text: So glad we were able to bring your husband relief after such a long, frustrating and painful road to recovery.  Grateful David is back in action - and grateful to have you in our patient family!

name: Debbie Blankenship
text: Dr Terral has been my orthopedist for 15 years. He is calm, patient and compassionate.  I am so thankful for successful knee replacements and broken hip repair.  Dr. Terral does not push for unnecessary surgery; instead he encourages noninvasive treatment first. This visit was for results of an MRI on my ankle.  Good news - surgery not necessary. I appreciate Dr. Terral and his staff. Bayside Orthopaedic acknowledges that faith is important in the healing process.  I am thankful especially for that. Besides providing excellent medical  care here, the Drs and nurses travel to many other countries to provide orthopaedic care.

resp.text: Thank you for that thoughtful feedback Debbie.  Dr. Terral leads our practice commitment to just what you've described: patient, compassionate care that ensures the patient understands everything from diagnosis to procedure.   We appreciate the opportunity to provide care all these years!

name: God Faith Fathers Family & Guns
text:
I had surgery shoulder surgery on December 14, 2020. I woke up in recovery with ungodly pain. The nurses did a great job getting the pain under control before discharging me.
Fast forward to Friday the 18th, I left two messages to have my pain medication filled before the weekend since I would run out.
It is Monday the 21st and still nothing about having my pain medication refilled. I guess patients being in pain is amusement for some on my doctor's staff.
In 2012 I would have happily recommended Bayside Orthopaedics to anyone. Oh yeah, when I had my first shoulder surgery back in May it took ten days for me to get my first prescription for pain medication filled.
As of 2020, I will not ever recommend anyone use Bayside Orthopaedics until a patient's care actually means something again.
If I could have given less than one star I would have!
UPDATE: 12/31/2020
Bayside Orthopaedic without my permission gave a third party my personal and medical information and this company wants $30 to fill out a form that would have taken my doctor 2-3 minutes to complete. Not only that this PPW was supposed to be completed within a couple of days after surgery and they give it to this third party company two weeks and two days after surgery. This is it for me with this practice!!!!!

resp.text: Our patients care is of the utmost importance to us. Thank you for bringing this situation to our attention. We value all feedback that can allow us to be better healthcare providers. We would appreciate an opportunity to follow up with you. Please give us a call at 251-928-2401 and ask to speak with Kirby.

name: Melanie Brown
text: Dr. Terral and his nurse are absolutely amazing!  Educating with compassion and passion for the patient and their work! Truly feel blessed that I was lead to Bayside for my surgery!! My only complaint is with the main front desk gals  and The Covid door monitor.. it’s crazy to me with such and  amazing Dr. that they are not pleasant as well as not welcoming, I believe the word is Anhedonia or (without) emotion.  It’s upsetting.

resp.text: Thank you for the feedback Melanie - we're glad to know your treatment went well.   Unfortunately, COVID-19 protocols create some  stiffness on arrival to the clinic.  We'll all be on the other side of this soon - and look forward to a more relaxed and welcoming experience when you visit.

Dr Terral has taken amazing, great care of my husband's knee. And wrist. Surgery, post op care, annual treatment for joint lubrication etc. He's knowledgeable, friendly and very skilled at repair and diagnosis.

text:
Undoubtedly the worst experience I have ever had with a doctor's office.

Appointment scheduled for 2:45, arrived 2:20, not seen til 4:15. Made me late to work.

Supposed to schedule an appointment for MRI. 7 days now, no contact, no appointment. Tried to call for two days now. They do not answer the phone.

The doctor seems good. The support staff I have had contact with were rude, indifferent, uncaring, and have no respect for your time.

I'm totally dissatisfied. Do not waste your time!!!

name: Sara Rutkoski
text: Had an appointment at 10:40, signed in at 10:30. It's now 11:25 and no sign of being seen anytime soon. When I approached the desk to ask about an estimated time I was "greeted" by who I assume is the office manager. She rudely stated "all the rooms are full so I don't know how long your wait will be. Do you want to reschedule?" I explained that I did not due to taking my child out of school for this appointment. The same extremely rude woman stars "well there are three people in front of you so it's going to be a while". I had already overheard that a patient who's appointment wasn't until 11:10 had already been put in a room. The next patient who signed in was told upon signing in that the doctor was running 30-40 minutes behind. And here we still sit. I wouldn't recommend this place to anyone! Rude staff and no consideration for the patients time.

name: L Armstead
text: I wouldn't even give them one star. But anyway, I was scheduled for an MRI and didn't realize how claustrophobic I was until the day of.  I immediately left the hospital and came back to  the office and explained to the nurse the issue I had.  Her was response was we can only give you one pill. First of all, I was new patient and they know nothing about me.  I hate taking medicine, but I was desperate to find out what is wrong with my arm.  I have been on the same job for 16 years and only have to go to the doctor twice because of job related issues.  When I initially met Dr. Determann he seemed like he really wanted to find out what was going on as well. After getting the MRI he only saw a small spot and started saying his office wasn't in to do pain management and that I was able to go back to work as normal lifting same amount weight.  He also stated that I should not be on light duty.  The medicine he prescribed for me made me drowsy and I could not function, so I brought it back and asked the nurse to dispose of them. He mentioned physical therapy and it's been over a week and I have not heard from the office for an appointment.  He mentioned making a referral appointment to see a rheumatologist and I have not received an appointment yet.  It's sad to me for someone to assume and stereotype instead of giving me a real solution other than medicine. This small spot has had me off work for almost six weeks and the office would not even fill out fmla papers so I didn't have to use up all my annual leave.  Dr. Determann told me I had to go the physician that referred me to him for them to complete the paperwork. This really bothered me, so I went to Dr. Goldman at the Daphne received a much simpler solution that gave some much needed relief the next day.  Some people are actually hurting and not after a prescription.  I don't want to be contacted by email, text, calls, or any form of communication from this office.  I have already told some of my family and friends Do Not Come to this office in Fairhope.  The staff and environment in Daphne was like night and day.  At the Daphne office I had a much better experience.

name: Wilma Royce
text: Pleasant office visit

resp.text: Thank you Wilma!

name: Terrie Ramos
text: I have been trying to get an appointment for relief to an injury with this group for almost a month. I jumped through hoops to get previous records from out-of-state and explained current medical problems. After all that, I get a call stating they can't help me. And, they didnt even see me! I have wasted 30 DAYS!! Don't waste your days! Life is too short. We have too many options.

name: Erin Speed
text: Love Dr Savage!!!

resp.text: thank you Erin - we do, too!

name: Lisa Kramer
text: Day after Christmas I fell and broke my humerus bone in my right arm I had to wait till January 7th to have surgery and I was referred Dr. Carter. I'll tell you what I've had the best experience with everyone there Dr Carter was very attentive and caring everyone in both offices the Foley and Fairhope offices were very accommodating. I don't remember everyone's name but Brian in the radiology department was so kind and tender with me while I was hurting. I have nothing but good things to say and I recommend them to anyone I thank everyone for all your care. I've never felt this way at a doctors office before like everyone truely cared about me and I'm just very much appreciative of you. Now I'm recovered and I don't have to come back unless I have problems and it's kind of sad that I won't see you again but I appreciate and very thankful to all of you. God bless ya'll. Thank God 🙏 for caring peeps like y'all. You definitely made a bad condition into an excellent recovery. Kudos to the whole team at Bayside Orthopedic. Very thankful to all.👍👍😘😘😘🤗

resp.text: Lisa - we're grateful for the kind words but most of all glad to hear you're doing well.   Dr. Carter and the entire team are here for you when you need us!

name: Deborah Stewart
text: Thanks to Dr Determann and his team for helping me recover from a fractured foot just before the holidays.  Using a boot walker Put my hips and spine somewhat out of alignment but Sarah Beaver DPT came to the rescue with a great therapy program.  Katherine,LPTA helped me strengthen my core and hips so I would not fall again.  It’s been a great experience with the entire organization.  thanks everyone for caring about my wellbeing.

name: Gloria K
text: My first visit went fine and on time as per my appointment. Dr. Determann very clear about my condition.

name: Amanda Comer
text: Always friendly! Very helpful staff! Dr. Terral was amazing with my mother-in-laws hip surgery!

resp.text: Thank you Amanda - good to hear!

name: Kathy Hahn
text: Dr.Baird is great!!!

resp.text: We agree - thank you Kathy!

name: Tricia ofyourbusiness
text: Lets see waiting over two hours after arriving 20 minutes early. They are supposed to be closed at 5 but it is currently 5:33 and im still waiting to get called. Hope you have no back or knee problems and have to get pain medication refills because they do not honor the 48 hour refill time even though you make sure you request it 3 days ealier so that it will be on time.

name: Ron Langley
text: There is nothing less than 1 star?

name: Randa Lewis
text: Office staff, specifically in billing dept were extremely rude when I called to make a payment. I will take my money and business elsewhere.

name: Beverly Crawford
text: You wait forever then they go to lunch and leave you in the waiting room until they get back. Then they'll call someone that just walked in

name: Ron Penrod
text: They are awesome

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words Ron!

name: Jackie Emmett
text: Excellent !!!

resp.text: Thanks for the five stars Jackie!

name: Don Jackson
text: Where do I begin? During my father’s stay at this facility, he contracted Ecoli and was hospitalized  for two weeks.  Following his hospitalization, an employee of the facility (who claimed to have been looking out for my father) started texting and calling me.  She advised me that my father was receiving inadequate care, that another employee was abusive to patients and that the facility was unsanitary.  ECOLI IS TRANSMITTED IN UNSANITARY ENVIRONMENTS.   The employee then attempted to leverage me for money.  It was classic:  “I am going to look out for your father. He is not being treated well.  I need money..  Let me hold a few dollars.”  The employee actually sent text messages asking for money.  The Director of the facility was advised of the employee’s conduct.  When he was advised, he stated on a teleconference with almost ten witnesses that the employee attempted to leverage me because I was “successful” without accepting responsibility for the employee’s conduct.  Unsanitary environment, telephones that don’t work (even though you are charged for them),   etc.  Since the visitation restrictions were imposed 14 months ago, I am concerned that the quality of care has declined.

name: Just 1 Man
text: Beware of this place.  Your family member is not safe.  They sent my mother in law off campus for an MRI that she wasn't scheduled for and didn't have it documented until the next day and never informed any of her 8 children that they were doing so. If there wasn't so much covering up and lying it wouldn't have been so bad.  Generally I believe in accepting responsibility and moving on to a solution,  but when grown women are lying and pushing the blame, that means this type of thing happens often.   If it had been my mother.... it wouldn't have ended like that.

name: Esi Fante
text: If you can avoid it PLEASE DO NOT go to this place! TERRIBLE!!!

name: Vicki Scott
text: Hillview Terrace is Amazing! My mom loves being there and they are taking such good care of her. We started in Rehab Select and they were great! The Administrator, Business Office, and the Nursing Staff on Oak Station are so so wonderful. They always check on my mom and keep her room clean. They have fun activities for the residents. We couldn’t ask for a better group of people to take care of my mom .

name: Douglas Dunn
text: My uncle was placed here for 14 days after a broken hip.  The center used the COVID-19 pandemic to keep family members from checking on him.  He was left unattended because they said he had to be quarantined.  His surgical dressings were not changed during his stay here.  He was not bathed.  Now he has bedsores, open sores in his groin area, and his surgical sutures were infected.  This facility used COVID-19 as an excuse for neglect.   He is now in more pain and in worst shape than before he went into this facility.

name: Kendra Johnson
text:
This review is for Rehab Select!

The admission process was seamless and the staff was outstanding! Huge thanks to all of you for taking care of my grandmother after a traumatic experience. We greatly appreciate you guys and couldn’t thank you all enough! Would definitely recommend!

Honorable mentions to Ms. Awilda, Audreanna, and Nurse Paige! You guys were awesome!

resp.text: Thank you

name: James Archie
text: Admission process was seamless, way faster than the hospital, the staff was very nice and i was informed of her health condition every day

resp.text: Thank you for your review and i'm glad you had a great stay. We are always looking for ways to make processes work better. Let us know if we can ever be of any assistance.  Thank you again.

name: audrianna laprade
text: I had a great experience, great staff and great care, sometimes they took a few minutes to answer the call light but overall very good

resp.text: Thank you for your review and I’m glad you had a great experience. We will continue to strive to exceed our customers expectations.  Thank you again and if we can ever be of assistance please let me know.

name: Berenice Lopez
text: My loved one received the best care here, the staff is very friendly , and they have an amazing Rehab program!

name: Fred Burnett
text: The nurses were very helpful

name: wendee hughes
text: Very nice and very clean facility. Staff are knowledgable and caring with patients. Had an excellent experience here and would recommend to anyone needing a place for their loved one!

name: Peggy Terry
text:
When you gotta go you gotta go !!
This is Rehab select adjoined to Hillview terrace.
This staff here doesn't get in a hurry for anyone. The call button is useless . I experienced this myself not the patient. I'm going to find out a top person to talk to . This was on Sunday afternoon between two and three . Finally got a tech by going to the desk . Oh she came and then disappeared for another ten minutes before actually fixing the problem.
Don't bring your family member here.
Rehab Select

name: Awilda Fegans
text:
I would recommso please with her out come.
— Awilda Fegsns
end Hillview Terrace to all of my Friends and Family...

name: Patricia Carroll
text: If you can AVOID this place at all cost. It shouldn't even be open.

name: Lover Boy
text: I've never been to this place, but I've interacted with a few of the staff at my former job. Those particular ones were rude & had no basic manners. I guess because they wear blue scrubs & work in a clinic that they must think they're above you. One in particular I dealt with named "Marghert" had a very cold demeanor the whole time I was waiting on her, and of course, she didn't say thank you or anything when the transaction was over smh. I won't refer any of my loved ones to this place. If you care about your loved ones, then you wouldn't either.👎

name: Jennifer Dickey
text: This place is a joke. Giving them one star is too much. I honestly cannot believe this place is still open. My mother's care was ridiculous. They never gave her her meds when they were suppose to be given. They all acted like they hated their jobs. They looked and talked to my mom like she was disgusting. I got her the hell out of there and took her to the hospital so she could get real care and they were appalled by her treatment as well. They even tried to blackmail her when she said she wanted to leave (per her surgeon who did not agree with any of her care) and stated that she would be stuck with the bill because Medicare wouldn't pay. I called Medicare myself and they said that's not true. The whole place smells like urine and feces. The rehab lady was rude as hell as well. No one here is professional. I could go on and on but just thinking about this place disgusts me. IF YOU LOVE YOUR FAMILY MEMBER, DO NOT SEND THEM HERE!!!!!!!!!!!

name: Dixie Forever
text:
If your family member passes away at this facility, the administrator sends any funds in the patient account to Alabama Unclaimed Property rather than turning the funds over to the designated family contact.  You will never be able to recover the funds, as the administrator will not authorize Unclaimed Property to release the funds.  The administrator will dodge your phone calls and refuse to communicate with you.  They are ripping off patient accounts.

The nursing home is filthy, needs repainting and reeks of urine.  DO NOT send your family member here.

name: Ann Jac-Gor
text: My mother in law came for rehab from knee replacement surgery. She has dementia, diabetes and the knee surgery.  They along with the insurance company said that they know how to deal with patients with dementia. They complained to my husband that she couldn't respond to their commands and she just sat there...his response was I thought you had the capabilities to deal with dementia patients? The response was "we don't do miracles." Mom had TWO UTIs while there. The second time we came close to the room on Sunday to a foul smell.  I checked to see if she was wet. She was wet and the pad beneath her was wet as well. They sent a culture of urine to be tested on Monday; the result was that she had a Urinary Tract Infection (UTI). By Wednesday they were awaiting prescription orders for her treatment.  My mother in law was transferred from there to another facility the next Tuesday. The UTI was still not treated. The facility where we had her transferred handled the UTI immediately. Dementia gets worse when there is an infection or UTI. She's Diabetic: they told me that they don't have a diabetic diet there to give patients. Well, I asked them not to give her sugar, caffeine, and pork. Her sugar was as high as 300+. When she was home, 118 was the highest unless she cheated then 220. She never took insulin shots; she got them there because they sent it up high with the bad diet, then gave insulin to bring it back down. Diabetic patients are groggy or sleepy when their glucose is up. According to them, she doesn't respond to commands. DUH if her glucose is high and she has a UTI, what the heck do they expect? OH, they don't do miracles! I guess I was talking to a wall when instructions and requests were given!!

name: andrew cook
text: I visited a family member in this facility and couldn't have been happier. Great facility and staff members. I wouldn't mind staying here when I get older!

name: Misael Hacked my account Santos Hernandez
text:
You all need to hire more men because ladies are not strong enough to pick up them people.
And your parking lot is too dangerous. I see why people dont like to visit anyone there because the parking is so difficult you might hit someones car. Hope y'all change how you do things. Thanks

name: Karlito Sway
text: Its depressing as hell to be honest. Why tf would anyone wanna send their loved one to die here?

name: Julianne Hansen
text: Sadly, I visited this facility to see a friend's mother who is recovering from an injury.  She said she hadn't had a bath and that she hadn't been "changed" all day.  Yet I saw plenty of staff gathered around the desk chatting and joking.  When I visited the restroom, a cockroach ran across the floor of the stall I was in .  I am appalled at the conditions here and would not want a loved one of mine placed here.

name: Daniel Bonner
text: My medicine is 2 hrs late every morning. The nurses will argue about something as small as weather I had 1 or two drops in my eyes. Very immature and arrogant nursing staff.

name: lrs 0022
text: Love this facility! good and clean environment

resp.text: Thank you for visiting our location.

name: Lakendra Jones
text: The administrator was nice and very professional

name: Sam Cullen
text: Corn dogs for bypass patient and filthy condition. This place needs to be closed

name: Genoc Genesis
text: I see Maggie Kellar and her nurse Mackenzie. They are both fantastic and very personable. I drive 45 minutes just to see them specifically. My experience with Mrs.Kellar is the best doctor/patient experience I have ever had. As long as the both of them are there I will always come back.

resp.text:
We appreciate the five-star review. Thank you for taking the time. I share this with the team!
Kindly,
April

name: melody galloway
text: Wonderful clinical staff.  Love love LOVE Dr. Lona!  She's intuitive and kind always.

resp.text:
Melody, thank you for taking the time to leave us a review. We appreciate your kind words and I will share them with the team.
Kindly,
April

name: Mark Gotschall
text: This place is so much the improvement over the Mobile location.  Miss Anita has always taken good care of me.

resp.text:
We appreciate the review and value your feedback. Thanks for taking the time. I will share it with our team!
Kindly,
April

name: Bernard Doug Cook
text: Seeing a therapist there, Barbara Lee, she's pretty good.

resp.text:
Hi Bernard, thank you so much for the review. I am happy to hear you've had a positive experience at BayView. I will share your feedback with our team!
Kindly,
April

name: Paula D
text: I love this office! I recently had my first appointment there in the office with Ms. kellar. The nurse mckenzie and ms Keller we’re both very kind and i could tell they really cared about me and my mental health. As long as dr kellar and McKenzie are there i will continue to come.

resp.text:
So glad you had a great experience, Paula. I will share your feedback and praise with our team. Have a wonderful day!
April

name: Gail GULF SHORES
text: So far so good for the excellent help I've got online with KATHERINE DAVIS. She is a very compassionate employee,  "goes the extra mile ". So helpful with any questions.  A keeper.

resp.text:
Hi, Gail! Thank you for the five-star review. We appreciate your kind words.
Sincerely,
April

name: Sandi Cushway
text: They completely changed my medications that I have been stable on for over 15 years (with not ever having to increase ANYTHING).  I have only seen the PA twice and she was pretty nice.  There seems to be little concern for what I, as their patient, am going through every single day as a result of their decisions.  They are making matters worse for me mentally to where I am barely functional at home or work.  The only reason I gave two stars is for the nurse, Anita.

resp.text:
Sandi, I am sorry to hear we did not meet your expectations. Your feedback will help us improve our services. If there is anything further you wish to add you can reach a member of our patient relations department at info@altapointe.org.
Kindly,
April

name: Billiam Quine
text: They have an issue with making sure their records are up to date. Their staff isn’t helpful and I’m not sure they could be even if they wanted to. Lots of “Its not my problem” going on there. Find someone else to see. Just because they may be the biggest certainly doesn’t mean they are the best.

resp.text:
Hi, Billiam. I am sorry to hear we did not meet your expectations of care. We appreciate the feedback because it will help us improve our care. If you would like to share more about your experience you can send an email to info@altapointe.org or reach our Patient Relations department at (833) 921-1811.
Kindly,
April

name: Serena kay
text: I found a place where I could get help for my autistic son that's transitioning into adulthood. It's nice to have a place we can call and talk to and get help with medications without coming across as different or weird.  They deal with these things on a daily basis and it feels good to be understood.

resp.text:
Hi, Serena Kay. Thank you for the five-star review. We appreciate you and your feedback.
Sincerely,
April

name: Shae McIntyre
text: First of all it took 3 months to get in to see a nurse practitioner to try to get different medication for my anxiety. Second, I finally get to my appointment and because I have shingles (which is a. Only contagious when the fluid in the blisters are touched but b. All of my stuff was covered and wrapped up) they said they would need to do a full decontamination sweep and I would have to get the clearance from my doctor before I can be seen  . So I spent an hour there waiting just to hear I'm the plague basically. I've never felt so offended. I already cant go to my own brothers wedding because of it but now this. I'm furious.

resp.text:
Shae, I am very sorry to hear we did not meet your expectations of care. Your feedback will help us improve our services. If you would like to provide us with additional information, you can speak to someone in our patient relations department by calling (833) 921-1810.
Kindly,
April

name: Juli Norman
text: Some of the most unkind judgmental unprofessional human beings I’ve ever met. Worst money I ever spent looking for help. Went here due to my doctor no longer being in practice and instead of getting back on my regular medications I Was accused of being under the influence by the NP I saw, being two days post op. She stated “you seem drowsy and irritable” I’m tired and in pain (since I was driving I couldn’t take my pain medication). The woman who took me back for my weight and BP answered her phone and began screaming at someone about what only I can assume was her boyfriend cheating on her. Not a single employee looked at me with a smile or made me feel welcome in the slightest. These woman look at you and judge you, they didn’t even talk to me before I felt like I wanted to run out of that building. I just wish I had read reviews before giving them my money.

resp.text:
Juli,  thanks for sharing your feedback. I am sorry your experience didn’t match your expectations. Your feedback will help us improve. Please feel free to reach out to our Patient Relations department (833) 921-1811 with any further comments, concerns, or suggestions you wish to share.
Kindly,
April

name: Ingrid Hartman
text: My family’s experience has always great!  The location is convenient, the medical staff thorough and the clinicians spend the time needed. Thank you!

resp.text: Hi, Ingrid! Thank you for the five-star review. It is our goal to deliver the utmost in care to our patients and their families so they can live their best lives.

name: Christa Bailey
text: People who come to BayView for help have issues. I was 2 minutes late and had to check in (wait for 6 minutes in line because a computer was down and I was standing there not knowing what to do and nobody would even look at me). I was told that I was 10 minutes late and my appointment is only 20 minutes long so I could reschedule or the doctor would work me in -of course I will have a no-show fee. I have never been here and not had to wait 15 minutes to see doc-I guess it’s a one way street.

name: Samantha Wade Caraway
text: DO NOT GO TO BAYVIEW! THESE PEOPLE DO NOT CARE ABOUT THEIR PATIENTS! They can not even file insurance correctly. If you don't agree with them, they will refuse to do ANYTHING for you. Their only option is to increase meds that do not work or put the patient in the hospital. If I could put ZERO stars, I would!

name: Richard Vin Zant
text: Yeah worst record keeping of any business I’ve been too.

resp.text:
Hi, Richard. I am sorry to hear we did not meet your expectations. Your feedback will help us improve our services. If you would like to provide any further information, please email us at info@altapointe.org
April

name: Monica White Hickman
text: Johnson and Hayes has a remarkable PT clinic. The staff is the best! Patient care and rehabilitation is their priority making sure each person is on the road to recovery. My personal PT, Nathaniel, is one of the best! He kept me informed of best practice to help me recover, explained the purpose of each exercise, and made sure I was doing the exercises correctly. The videos they send of your prescribed exercises helped me while I was completing the therapy at home. Thank you all for taking good care of me.

name: Teresa Mason
text: Great therapist, Ethan Hodges!  He really helped with the issue I was experiencing. Highly recommend

resp.text: Thank you, Teresa! We are so glad you're feeling better.

name: Patti Moss
text: A great place to receive personalized attention for whatever needs you have. Kendall is excellent, in that she listens first and follows up with informative information as well as well-thought-out exercises that you can also do at home. It's a non-threatening environment that brings about results!

resp.text: Thank you for your excellent review, Patti! We appreciate it very much. So glad you are feeling better.

name: newsum karen
text: Nathaniel has done an exceptional job at assessing my condition and making a plan to help with my goals as a patient, bringing good results.  He is very kind and caring. I highly recommend going to him  for PT.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the excellent review. We are glad Nathaniel is taking great care of you.

name: Gail Barnes
text: Jack Bice has been great!! I feel like he spent more time diagnosing me than my doctors. He has come up with a diagnosis/plan and it is working. I am feeling much better!

resp.text: Thank you, Gail! We appreciate you, too.

name: Allen Lastinger
text: I truly appreciate the one on one approach to my physical therapy. I like the fact that there is constant feedback and communication that insures I am addressing the issues and healing properly. The entire team at Johnson & Hayes are friendly and helpful in accommodating schedule changes. I hope I never have another experience that requires physical therapy, but if I do, it will be with Johnson & Hayes.

name: wanda canada
text: I am pleased to say Johnson & Hayes PT. are the best. After just a week of PT I am walking straight with very little pain. From the front door to the rear of the facility everyone is professional caring and friendly. I recommend this facility if you need PT treatments.

name: Tamara Lang
text: Best therapy facilty ever!  Everyone is great!  I will not go anywhere else. Jack Bice is an expert and will work endlessly until  a person is healed.

resp.text: Wow - Thanks for the review, Tamara!  Jack is a great therapist and we're glad to hear you've benefited from your partnership with him.  We appreciate you choosing J&H PT for your care!

name: Janis Williams
text: Each time I'm at J&H and leave, I am better than I was when I arrived!    Ethan's questions to me and his notes help focus on the areas of concern, and he gets busy with the next steps.  All the staff are courteous and helpful.

name: Tonjawally
text: I love my therapist, tech’s, and office staff at Johnson and Hayes. Everyone is so kind and compassionate towards their patients and each other. I’ve found I definitely need a little extra kindness while my body is healing and repairing so this is the place for me. ❤️

resp.text: Thank you very much for the review!  We appreciate the feedback and are excited you’re receiving great care from all of our team members.  Thank you for choosing J&H as a partner in your wellness journey!

name: nan pike
text: Ricia is such a wonderful therapist and person. She truly cares about my pain and has a plan to fix it. She goes above and beyond. I feel very lucky to have her treating me.

name: Carla Weaver
text: The staff has always been super nice, the facility is clean. I have been to SportsMed too. J&H is like the Ritz Carlton and SM is a motel 8. The billing is accurate and front of house staff very friendly. Parking is easy.

name: Cathy Simpson
text: I love the way they put you at ease by listening, providing the best treatment and all have a great sense of humor.

resp.text: Cathy, thank you for your excellent review. We are so glad you are receiving excellent care at J&H. We are grateful for you.

name: Cindy Shrader
text: Nathaniel is very thorough and listens, as well as refers to xrays to come up with the right treatment plan for me. I feel safe and appreciated.

resp.text: Cindy, your comments and review make our day. Thank you!

name: Lindsey Wright
text:
Wonderful place.  Professional, kind and caring.
Todd created an at-home program for me.  The link to
my exercises is easy to get to and has a video and explanation for each one so I can be sure I am doing  them correctly.

resp.text: Thank you for the feedback and comments, Lindsey!  We're glad you're enjoying our home exercise program.  We appreciate you choosing J&H in Huntsville for your care!

name: Angie Powell
text: Johnson & Hayes is an amazing place!  The atmosphere is warm and welcoming.  My therapist, Megan Miller, has been a great listener and very informative. She has always explained each procedure thoroughly and eased me gently back into my regular activities after my calf injury. I have noticed this same care from other therapists with their patients. I would highly recommend J&H to anyone young or old who is dealing with pain or injury.

resp.text:
Angie - Thank you very much for your review and feedback.  We strive to make the patient experience enjoyable throughout every aspect of the therapy experience.  We’re glad to hear that you had a positive experience with the team.

Megan is a fantastic therapist who is very passionate out helping her patients in their wellness journey.  We are glad to hear your partnership with her was successful.

Thank you for choosing J&H for your care!

name: Wanda Meyers-Hines
text: Susan Dupre is an excellent Physical Therapist.  And, she is exceptionally knowledgeable about the human body.  I was in great pain when I arrived for my evaluation appointment.  She was personable, listened intently, and was exceptionally  compassionate and accommodating.  Susan found a work space that was quieter, had a lower light level, and requested that the music be lowered.  I felt hopeful.  In three days my health improved and I am feeling better everyday!  The Customer Service staff is equally great.

resp.text: Thank you very much for your review and feedback, Wanda.  Our team, from the front desk to the clinicians, works to operate as a cohesive unit, creating a personal environment for each patient and adjusting the plan of care according to the individual needs and responses of each patient.  We're glad to hear that you've had a positive experience and that you have enjoyed your partnership with Susan.  She's great!

name: Vicki Kendall
text: I’ve had to do therapy several times over the past few years. I have been to a couple of different places until I found Johnson and Hayes. I’ll never go anywhere else again. Jacqueline is the therapist I see and ask for when I get a new therapy order. She is amazing! She is very caring, she listens and I never feel like she is rushing to get me out of the door. She spends quality time with me during our sessions and I always make good progress with the exercises and help she gives me. Also, with all the COVID stuff out there, I am never concerned about cleanliness or about being one on one with the therapists. Everyone is super cautious and careful. Can’t say enough good things!

resp.text:
Wow!  Thank you for the review and feedback, Vicki!  It’s a team effort here at J&H and we are focused on helping our patients get better in a safe and comfortable environment.  We’re excited that you recognize that.

Jacqueline is a fantastic therapist.  We’re fortunate to have her on the team and we are glad that she’s been able to develop and supports plans of care that are beneficial for you.

Thank you for continuing to choose Johnson & Hayes PT for your care!

name: Mech Eng
text: Awesome team of physical therapists!  Ethan Hodges was/is my PT and he is professional, courteous,  and outwardly concerned about my well being.  He's through and takes his time with me during each visit.  All the therapist collaborate with each other as needed making the experience for each patient top notch.  You don't just have the skills and experience of one therapist, you get to have the many years of combined experience at your disposal such that you get the best possible outcome and higher rate of success/recovery.  The open environment of the clinic is neat as well.  Highly recommend.

resp.text: Thank you for your review, Mech.  The word, "team" means a lot to us at Johnson & Hayes.  We're happy that you found value from your time with Ethan (a fantastic therapist), and that you also recognized the larger benefit of the collective knowledge of the clinical team.  Thank you for choosing J&H for your care.

name: Cyn Mann
text: Caring and knowledgeable therapists who really listen to you. The entire staff is polite and friendly. The facility is kept very clean and they observe COVID protocol to keep their patients safe. Ethan is the therapist working with me on my lower back issues. The work he has done has already helped my pain level to go down. I am highly pleased with the level of care I receive at Johnson & Hayes.

resp.text: Cyn - Thank you very much for your review and feedback.  We're striving every day to provide personalized, best practice care to each of our patients in a safe and comfortable environment.  We're excited that you recognized this and that your partnership with Ethan is going fantastic.  Thank you for choosing J&H for your care!

name: L Campbell
text: The physical therapists, the assistant PT's, and the front desk staff are friendly, professional, and do outstanding work. There is a reason I keep coming back here to rehab after multiple knee surgeries. Jacqy knows how to push me to get back to the physical activities I did before surgery and that's what I want. Each patient's therapy is customized to them and what they want to accomplish after therapy. I highly recommend Johnson & Hayes and will continue to use them in the future when needed.

resp.text: Wow! Thank you for sharing this. We are grateful you choose J&H for PT.

name: Joyce Rogers
text:
Susan Dupre tested and treated me for vertigo (BPPV).
She took the time to thoroughly explain the testing procedures and maneuvers she would be performing on me. After each maneuver, she would make sure I felt OK before going on to the next maneuver. She made me feel comfortable and never rushed.  Susan also made time to answer all of my questions and concerns that I had regarding vertigo.  She  gave me exercises to perform at home; again making sure I understood how to perform them correctly. I felt in very good hands with Susan treating me and I’m appreciative that she shared with me her vast knowledge of vertigo and the spinning/dizziness associated with it.

resp.text: Joyce - Thank you very much for your review and comments.  We're fortunate to have Susan on the Johnson & Hayes team.  She represents everything that we're striving for in our care for all patients:  Individualized care directed in partnership with the patient utilizing education and a personal touch to both educate the patient and ensure a high level of comfort with the care they are provided.  Thank you for giving Susan and Johnson & Hayes an opportunity to partner with you in your journey back to wellness!

Jack is extremely compassionate for the work he does every day.  His goals are to make progress with his patients, along with sympathizing with their pain management through therapy.

If something wasn’t working, she either modified or replaced that exercise. I have been extremely satisfied with the results and will use J&H again with needed. <Sam O'Hanian>

name: Chad Wood
text: I had a great experience with Johnson and Hayes.  I went in after suffering severe pain for 3 weeks resulting from a recent injury. I went to see the physical therapists at J&H in hopes of fixing the underlying issue, not just relieving the pain.  Believe it or not, my injury and pain were resolved after my first visit!  Ethan saw me and diagnosed and treated underlying issue which i had never expected, and after a short session I left with an appointment to return in a week.  The next day I started to realize that my pain was gone and I was beginning to feel good again.  Thanks J&H, and thank you Ethan, for getting me well again.  Highly recommended!!!  Clean facility, friendly and knowledgeable staff.

resp.text: Thank you, Chad! We appreciate you choosing J&H.

resp.text: Margo, thank you for trusting us with your care. We appreciate you and are thankful you are doing better.

name: Clay Peake
text: I have been to almost every PT in the city, Nesin, TOC, Sports Med, Mandeville, P3; all working on a chronic knee issue over the last 15 years or so. They all basically have the same set of exercises and similar facilities but J&H just seemed better; better staff, better atmosphere, better equipment. They have the right mix of relaxed attitude but also, hey we've got an hour, let's improve your function today. My therapist Josh was like that, first of all very knowledgeable, relaxed but all business, listened to me but didn't let me drive the train; just struck a good balance all the way around. And actually I learned some new exercises that really helped, and dry needling was a first which I think was the thing that really gave me the most benefit. So anyway, obviously I recommend J&H if you want a no-nonsense approach to rehab in a very welcoming and comfortable atmosphere supported by some knowledgeable, professional therapists.

resp.text: Thank you very much for the review, Clay.  Josh is extremely knowledgable and he works hard to personalize his approach to every patient.  We're excited your time at J&H has resulted in improvement and we look forward to continuing to work with you so you can get back to doing what you enjoy!

resp.text: Joan - Thank you for your review and feedback.  We are passionate about providing personalized care for each patient and we are excited to see that Susan was able to partner with you to develop a plan of care that worked well for you. text:

Ethan is amazing - he asks questions until he understands the root cause, and he addresses it with focused exercises and stretches. Feels significantly better after 6 sessions. I don't take advil daily anymore! So great to be learning techniques that will enable me to have the active lifestyle I want long-term without invasive/expensive alternatives. The front desk folks are also proactively helpful; like any great place, they figured out my insurance coverage, and it has been easy to get in and schedule appointments around work.

text: Patient, thorough,effective

text:
I felt like I was pushed to do my very best. But at the same time Jacqy was patient with me and continually told me to listen to my body.
Perfect combination!

name: Jessie Doyle
text: The therapists are extremely friendly, and the facility is well-stocked with a variety of equipment. I went for a sprained knee, and made progress much more quickly than I expected to.

resp.text: Thank you for your review, Jessie!  We're here if you ever need us in the future!

text: Appointments are on time and the treatment is personalized and very thorough.  You need to use J&H if you need PT!

text: Five stars! Clean facility and wonderful quality of care. Johnson & Hayes knock it out of the park! Thank you!

text: Love the staff at Johnson and Hayes!  Very personable service.  I definitely recommend them for those with injuries, surgery recovery and pain.

name: Ed Ragsdale
text: Great staff

resp.text: We appreciate the review, Ed!

name: Keith Dugas
text: not only machines and exercises utilized but the hands on therapy from knowledgeable therapists really help get you where you want to be.

name: Sharon Stockman
text: I have completed extensive therapy at Johnson and Hayes. Jack Bice is the best. I recommend this Therapy Center to everyone.

name: Cathy Tichow
text: Ethan is very skillful, asks lots of good questions and then listens carefully. He has helped me with plantar fasciitis - my pain is much reduced. I think the dry needle therapy helped me and he did a great job administering the therapy. I recommend him.

name: Bridney09
text: Please do send your loved ones here. My grandmother had triple bypass surgery at the age of 85 and was sent there for one week to do rehab. And she was told to bath herself, she came home with an infected bed sore. I made several calls to the nurses station to speak with her and was always told they couldn’t take the phone to her and the room she was placed in did not have a working phone. My Uncle called and he was told by nurse they would call the phone company to inspect the phone to see why it was not working. Which was never done. This facility in prisons the elderly. Please avoid by all means.

resp.text:
Hello,

Capitol Hill Healthcare takes the overall health and wellbeing of our residents very seriously. Your feedback is important to us and we’d like to know more so we may address your concerns. We invite you to contact our administrator at 334-834-2920.

name: IFeedOnYourSalt 2EAZY
text: Terrible place bad with terrible staff that treat the the elderly badly. The food is extremely poor and the sanitation is badly with roaches near the air conditioning units and the beds.

resp.text: Hello, Capitol Hill Healthcare believes in providing dignified, quality healthcare and a safe environment for our residents. It seems you have concerns that we would like to know more about. In order to assist you, please contact our administrator at (334) 834-2920.

name: helen mize
text: After a stay in the hospital I needed to go to a rehab hospital until I was able to care for myself.  I feel extremely fortunate to have had the opportunity to go to Capital Hill Rehab Hospital.  Everyone from the Administrator to the nurses, physical therapist, kitchen and cleaning crew were very friendly and helpful. The facility was very clean and offers activities and open spaces where you can visit with family or just enjoy.  The ability to have family members join you for a meal was an added bonus in well being.  I have visited friends in other facilities and they do not compare to the quality of care and friendly atmosphere of Capital Hill. I would recommend Capital Hill to anyone needing additional care.

resp.text: Helen, thank you for your review. Your feedback is important to helping us continue to provide quality healthcare and a good customer service experience.

name: Mayra Atchley
text: My father is currently at Capitol Hill and he speaks Spanish. The staff have gone above and beyond to accommodate him with the language and cultural  differences. They are putting ideas together to make him Feel comfortable and are working on providing easy communication via flash cards. They have been attentive, caring and have communicated anything that may help him make the transition. They have provided love and understanding to me. Everybody from management to the CNA’s have been outstanding!  Thank you

resp.text: Mayra, thank you so much for your feedback. Hearing from the people we serve and their loved ones helps us continue to grow.

name: Jimmy Arrington
text: I have been a patient at Capitol Hill twice, my experience there was great. The staff was very welcoming, helpful, courteous and beyond reproach. Therapy services were very helpful and help me to regain my strength. I would recommend Capitol Hill Healthcare of Montgomery to anyone that need rehab services. Lisa Murry- Case Manager will be your extended family during your stay there, and will take care of any of your medical needs. She goes above any beyond to take care of your problems.

resp.text: Jimmy, thank you for your review. We appreciate that you have taken the time to tell us about your experience. Your input is vital to our continuous commitment to providing a quality care.

name: Jessica Kearley
text:
Horrible. Inattentive. Slow to respond  Lacking basic nursing skills. I will not take another family member there.

I did contact the Administrator, Michael Burnett in June 2019 right after the death of my family member. I met with him and two other staff administrators. I provided all details and my contact information and they were to look into the case and contact me once they found out what happened. I never heard back.

resp.text: Jessica, providing quality healthcare for our residents is important to us. It seems that you may have some concerns that we would like to learn more about. We invite you to contact our administrator at 334- 834-2920.

name: Heather Davis
text: I recently did my clinicals here and it was by far the best place I've been to. Me and my class toured a few facilities and Capital Hill has been the most organized, cleanest,and friendliest. All the residents look so happy and clean and well taken care of.  As soon as you walk in you feel welcomed by the staff. If anybody is considering a place to put a loved one or looking for work, this is the place to come.

resp.text: Thank you for your feedback. Capitol Hill works to provide the best possible experience to our residents, families and visitors. We appreciate your review.

name: Nancy Nobles
text: The people and the care were top notch. We were very scared at first and everyone put us at easy. We had been in other rehabs and this is the one. THANK YOU!

resp.text: Thank you for your review. We appreciate the feedback on your experience with Capitol Hill.

name: Justin Farris
text: Friendly front desk. PTs were excellent with my grandparents.  They were nice and helpful. They cared about them and made sure they improved.  The facilities were well-kept and  the bedrooms were clean.  They were able to fit in my grandmother for a salon appointment, which made her very happy. Overall, I was very impressed.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your feedback.  We always strive to provide the best solutions and care for our residents.

name: Hevan Lunsford
text: My grandmother is a hospice patient and recently went for respite for a 5 day stay so my husband and I could have some rest.  We were so so nervous and so was she.  They put her in a nice room to herself which was great - she is a introvert.  She loves the food.  I felt very comfortable after a few days since she was so content.  She even told me the day before we were to bring her home she could stay a few more days if we wanted and would be happy to come back! This is saying a lot from a lady who hates leaving her house.  So thankful it was a good experience!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your feedback.  We are so happy to help you and your loved ones.

name: sheafran89
text: As a healthcare professional trusting others with my family is hard and the burned that trust. My father has fallen 3 different times with major injuries and no remorse or ownership from their employees.

resp.text: Thank you for your feedback. We are sorry to hear that you and your loved one may have had a negative experience. The health and well-being of our residents is important to us. We would like to know more about your experience and concerns. Please stay in contact with us as we continue to look into this matter. Feel free to contact our administrator at 334-834-2920.

name: Laurie Davis
text: Wish I could give this place a negative star. If you love the person, DON'T leave them here!!! My dad was here for rehab and had an open wound on his foot and in three days the dressing never got changed!! When I transferred him to a different facility a serious infection had took hold. He almost lost toes over this!! The staff has no care for the people that stay here.   My dad told me they never came when he hit the call button. When I came to see him they were all socializing in the hallway.  My dad was seriously neglected, bordering on abuse.

resp.text: Thank you for your feedback. We are sorry to hear that you and your loved one may have had a negative experience. The health and well-being of our residents is our top priority. We are currently investigating your concerns. We invite you to stay in contact with us as we continue to look into this matter. Feel free to contact our administrator at 334-834-2920 if you have any further questions or concerns.

name: Ashley Austin
text: no star rating (they made me select a star). this place was the worst ever. I would not let my dog go and stay there. the nurses drugged up my mom. she was placed on a different floor and sat in her waste all day. she was wrapped up like a hotdog and wreaking with filth. no way. I moved my mom outta there quickly. I asked them to bathe her and they showed me where the shower was told me to help myself. I don't know how they are passing any inspection. food was great. but the care was lousy!!!!

resp.text: Your feedback is appreciated and we have reviewed your concern. We are sorry to hear about your experience and will use this opportunity to review our procedures.

name: Stephine Luckey
text: This place is pure Hell on Earth! Even the nurses there call it "Capitol Kill". Easy to see why. There are 2 nurses in the whole place that are professional enough to give true care. The meals there are inedible, they consistently run out of supplies. Most of the nursing staff & aides are hateful to your loved ones. I've been there when people were just ignored while literally crying in pain(well past the medication times). I've seen people admitted & no one even knew they were there, so they were getting no care at all. The administration there is a nightmare. Bring anything to their attn & they will flat out lie to you about handling the situation. We had one of the nurses there be so awful to our Mom that we reported her. Since then she's been even worse to our Mom & not only that, she's got other care staff to be nasty to her as well. If your loved one needs anything, the care there gets huffy & put out about it, so what they actually give is attitude & rough physical treatment... And for all this lousy treatment, expect to pay near $7000.00/mth for the privilege. The PT team there is their crowning glory. They were absolutely awesome & so helpful & we thank God for them. Past that... DON'T LEAVE ANYONE HERE!!

resp.text: Thank you for your feedback. We take the health and well-being of our residents at Capitol Hill Healthcare very serious. We are sorry to hear that you and your loved one may have had a negative experience. We invite you to stay in contact with us as we continue our review. It is important for us to work with our residents and their loved ones to ensure the best possible quality of life. Feel free to contact our administrator at 334-834-2920 if you have any further questions or concerns.

name: mary1234k
text: My uncle has been living here for a few years now and ever since we have had a theft problem. It started out with someone taking his candy and drinks. Then it went to someone taking his wheelchair charger and now someone is going in his room while he is sleeping going in his bag that lays right next to him and taking his money. And all the directors can say is well we will investigate and call you in 2 days. Like WTH... I  will just be up there with the police and let them look into this situation. How about that Mr. Director

name: Susan Smith
text: Great care of my Aunt!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your feedback. It's an honor to be able to serve families like yours in our community and state.

name: Tiffany Thomas
text: Worked there for seven years wouldn't put my dog in the place and my dog died years ago. I worked with some of the best people you'll ever meet is why I stayed but management and head could care less about the residents or the little people who make the place go around. If I could give zero stars I would. No supplies ever how can you provide care with nothing to do it with! The building is old hot nasty and falling apart not sure how or why its still in business. This place is hell on earth.

resp.text: Thank you for your feedback. We are sorry to hear that your experience as an employee was not satisfactory. We realize that our team members are an important part of taking care of our residents and they should be treated with respect. We appreciate your review. We will continue to build the strength and unity of our team and work to maintain the well-being of residents.

name: Phyllis Nicholson
text: Uncle Thomas is a patient there and has been treated so nice by all.

resp.text:
Phyllis,
Thank you so much for your review.

name: Gunnar Chambers
text: Moved our father from a nursing home out of state to Capital Hill because they had a contract with the VA. What a poor decision this was for us to have made. The quality of care is terrible. The care and concern of the floor staff is terrible as well. There were a few nurses that actually cared but most were too busy sitting on their fat behinds at the nurse's station talking and playing on the computer. Anytime you asked for something they acted like it was a huge bother and distraction. Could never get a return call from management, never received any updates to care or changes to medications. Communication was non-existent from staff. Things were regularly stolen out of our father's room, clothing and food gifts would disappear. Would not recommend this facility to anyone that cares about their loved one.

resp.text: Thank you for your feedback. Your review is important to continually strengthening the quality of our care and service. We are sorry to hear about your experience and we are reviewing it. We understand that communication about the welfare of loved ones is important and we want to be as helpful as possible. Feel free to contact our administrator at 334-834-2920 if you have any further questions.

text: It's a nice well kept nursing home.
