resp.text: Thank you for your support of our practice!

name: Victoria Fox Kinnamont
text: I LOVE MY CHIROPRACTIC TEAM!!! Dr. Meredith, her husband Jim, and their staff are kind, understanding, and thorough. I first "walked" into their office in so much pain. It was more like a crawl. With every appointment, my pain level and quality of life have improved. It's been over a year and I'm still a faithful patient. Dr. Meredith is also helping me through my new pregnancy! THANK YOU!

name: Brent Curtin
text: I am not the easiest patient in any capacity and I love these guys. Doc Mere and Jim are first class. I recommend them Highly if you are looking for a chiropractor. They take time to get to know you and want to see you get better.

name: Therese Crowson
text:
I would like to thank Health Source Chiropractic for the amazing Rehab and Wellness service I've received. Dr. Meredith is passionate with her service and knowledge. My health and mobility has excelled above whatever I could have imagined. I'm so grateful I've had the opportunity to experience the care and knowledge of Dr. Meredith. I have to admit I was a little skeptical at first. This was my first experience with Chiropractic services. I was referred by a co worker and now almost all of our staff and family members are under Dr. Meredith's amazing care!
Please don't suffer if you need care. Dr Meredith will get you back your quality of life you deserve. Also the staff Jim and Carla are so kind and helpful. I can't thank you all enough for your services.

Life time patient,

Therese Crowson

name: Sarah Creech
text:
Skilled, caring professionals.  State-of-the arts equipment.

I had a debilitating ear ache that persisted for over a year.  Doctors examinations found no problem with my ear and I was actually diagnosed as having migraine headaches located in ear area.  Medications helped temporarily, but ear ache always came back.  HealthSource of Spanish Fort was able to determine and fix the source of my ear ache.   The pain was caused by a misalignment in my neck and upper back.  After two months of treatments, I am so happy to say,  my ear is 'pain free.'

Due to an automobile accident years ago, I had a spinal fusion (L4 and L5).  I continue to go to HealthSource monthly for maintenance.  Their massage therapist is wonderful!  A very welcome, affordable member of their staff.  Thank you HealthSource.

name: bjjenkinsand3kids
text: Dr Meredith, Jim, and Carla are amazing to say the least! I started seeing them with nearly no range of motion and in extreme pain! Within 2 months I have great range of motion now and my pain has decreased drastically!  Although I'm not completely better yet, I'm definitely headed in that direction! I will definitely continue to use them indefinitely!

name: Skylor Yates
text: Great people with great work.

name: Todd Harding,sr
text: Dr.Merideth and her assistant Jim got my back, neck, and pelvic bone back in alignment. I'm feeling like a million bucks and got me back in the  golf game again. They really know their stuff. Awesome experience.

name: Danny Spybey
text: Been going there for years and they have never let me down! As an active golfer it is a perfect fit!

name: Chance White
text: Dr. Addess and Jim have helped my son during football season as well as the off season.  He used to have migraines and that has stopped since receiving treatment from Health Source Chiropractic.  They even came to one of his games to watch him play.  I will recommend them to anyone and everyone.  They not only offers a great service, they genuinely care about you as a person.

name: Margot Hamilton
text: Amazing people. Very caring and always out for the patients best interest.

name: Raeann Passmore
text: The only thing I can say other than this being one of the friendliest and helpful places I've ever been to, is the staff are amazingly informational and I would recommend anyone I know to this place so if anyone is in need of a great chiropractor along with some great new friends this is the place for you and again thank all of you at Health Source for being supportive and helpful

name: Allen Blood
text:
The staff was very knowledgeable in the techniques that allowed me to progress quickly and easily in my rehab. Even with multiple members helping me over several months, they were all on the same page where my progress was and what the next steps were to be taken. They are light hearted and seem to enjoy their work and the interaction with those that need their help.
I would definitely recommend TherapySouth Vestavia to anyone who needs physical therapy after surgery or injury!

name: Susan Johnson
text: Therapy South has been my favorite place to be since my rotator cuff surgery.  When I arrived there I could not even touch the top of my head, style my hair, or other daily things we take for granted. My surgery humbled me; these therapists motivated me, encouraged me, and made me feel that I could accomplish anything!  My doctors goals seemed unattainable, but with the help of Hannah, Laura, Patrick, both Allans, Jo and Nate, I achieved my goals in five months! With encouragement when I was discouraged, praise when I did well, and personal attention to me, I began to feel a close bond with these gifted people. I began to feel like they were “family,” so when I left today it was bittersweet. I’m proud I met my goals, but sad to leave all of these sweet friends I have made! They not only helped me heal my body, but my spirit and soul. There aren’t enough words to say “Thank you” to the people who gave me my mobility back! I will definitely pop in to visit when I go to Publix!!

resp.text: Great job Susan! We are so proud of you and thankful that you are now part of the TherapySouth family 🙂! We wish you the best!

name: Larry Stone
text:
Today was my last day of PT at Therapy South. My experience at this facility was phenomenal. Everyone was such a professional and friendly and I feel that they became my friends. They also can work as a team to adjust to your needs. I would definitely use this group again but hope I won’t need to.
A special shout out to Armin who put up with me and got my shoulder ( after 2 surgeries) back in great shape.

name: Pary Payne
text:
Everyone here was very kind, friendly, professional, and just down to earth good people. I spent six months doing PT at Therapy South in 2020 after a Mountain Bike wreck and a couple surgery’s on my left shoulder (2 metal plates and 19 screws). I mostly worked with Armin who is great and knows his stuff, but spent enough time there to get to know everyone and they all know their stuff. Really Great people that I highly recommend.

Thank You guys and gals!!

- Daniel Payne

name: Laurie Carey
text: I used Therapy South for some neck/shoulder pain that was also causing a lot of numbness and tingling in my arm, hand, and fingers. From the moment I scheduled my first appointment I had a positive experience. Ryan worked efficiently and communicated well and I always felt comfortable to ask questions and be honest about what I was feeling. The entire staff is friendly and welcoming and work to make the environment and experience positive for their patients.

name: Lilly Welch
text: My experience with TherapySouth Vestavia was wonderful! I came in with a bad sprain from a dance related injury, and Ryan got me up and dancing again in no time! The whole staff is friendly and welcoming, and it is clear that they want you to succeed and get stronger. Ryan was incredibly kind and thorough and made sure that I felt 100% before walking out the door after my last appointment. On top of all of that, they maintained wonderful protocols to help prevent the spread of COVID-19. I felt very safe during my time at the clinic. You can not go wrong with TherapySouth and Ryan!

name: Bob Opkins
text: I've been to Therapy South for several sports injuries over the past 2 years.  Armin has done a great job fixing my knee, neck and leg adductor problems.  I tried several therapists for my neck and none were able to help.  Armin was the only one who was successful using dry needling, manipulation and providing rehab exercises.  I highly recommended Therapy South in Vestavia.  The entire staff is friendly and helpful.

name: Laurie Lorino
text: Alan Spooner is the best physical therapist I have ever been to. He cares about his patients and their progress. He's very patient and has always helped me get better with treatment. The facility is clean, has an upbeat atmosphere and parking is easy. All of the employees at TherapySouth in Vestavia are very friendly and helpful making every visit as enjoyable as possible. I'm sure I'll have other PT needs in the months, years to come and I will always come to this location even though there are other TherapySouth facilities that are closer in location to me.

name: Web Walters
text: Have been going to see Ryan at therapy south vestavia and he’s done a great job working on my issues. Takes time to understand the issue and then works on ways to improve. I’ve been going for a couple months and can see major progress. Highly recommend.

name: Eric Brennan
text: TherapySouth Vestavia is dedicated to make you better.  They get to know your therapy needs and get a plan together to get you up and moving again regardless of fitness level. Hannah, Alan,  Armin, Laura and Jo will make you feel welcomed and are very friendly.  They take care of their patients!

name: Judy Davis
text: Excellent therapists! Very professional and well trained. I benefited tremendously from my therapy sessions with Hannah. Clean, well organized location. It doesn’t get any better than this.

name: Mike Thomas
text:
Fantastic group of PTs who are experienced, professional and positive.  I have had two tours with this crew to rehab after rotator cuff repairs on both shoulders and I could not be more pleased with the outcome.  Thanks to everyone involved!
- Mike Thomas

resp.text: Thank You Mike!

name: Jenny Hebert
text: My experience at TherapySouth Vestavia was excellent.  My therapist, Armin Hornikel, worked with me after a hip surgery, and then several months later for some foot issues.  He always listened to me, never got tired of my questions, and encouraged me to do my best.  He was very good at explaining how the muscles, bones, tendons, and ligaments all worked together and why I needed to do certain exercises to improve my condition.  One of the things I appreciated most was his sense of humor that always left me feeling a little bit lighter each time I left.  Everyone on the staff at TherapySouth Vestavia was friendly and gave me encouragement when I needed it most.  I highly recommend this group.

resp.text: Thank you Jenny!

name: Garrick Stone
text: After surgery for a broken hip, from a cycling accident, I was referred to TherapySouth Vestavia for rehab/PT. Alan Spooner,  Armin Hornikel and the Vestavia team all took exceptional care of me. The team had goals for each visit and pushed me to meet and exceed them. The team also provided me, and other patients, with abundant amounts of (much needed) encouragement with each visit. I had a great experience with the Vestavia team and would recommend them to anyone needing physical therapy services.

name: Chip Denton
text:
Very professional group. The whole team is friendly and work to make patients feel welcome.
Laura is an excellent therapist.She spent time understanding patient goals and expectations and worked with me to achieve them.

resp.text: Thank you Chip!

name: Michael Montenegro
text: Staff is super friendly and Alan Spooner is the best!

name: Jeffery Phillips
text: This has been an outstanding experience for me ( my first ) from start to finish! From my first session until my last the entire team was a true pleasure to work with. The professionalism and compassion with each therapist I was with was obvious and their understanding my injury and my ability to recovery has just been remarkable. Thanks to the entire team for a job well done!

resp.text: Thank you Jeffery!

name: Emily Batson
text: I have had a long road of recovery with multiple knee surgeries. Vestavia Therapy South has been a huge source of help and constant support for me through a long process. They have worked hard and gone above and beyond to make sure all of my needs are met. From Jo at the front desk, to every PT in the establishment, they are all fantastic. I am grateful to have them on my side and I will absolutely suggest them to others and use them again for my own family. Thank you, Therapy South Vestavia, for being so wonderful!

name: Sydney Newsom
text: Being in pain with your mobility hindered can be a very helpless feeling. From the moment I walked in the door here, I knew they were going to take care of me. Everyone you come in contact with is so warm and friendly. My PT, Hannah, was amazing. Unfortunately, I ended up having surgery but when I start back with PT, I won't go anywhere else. I'm partial to Hannah but feel confident that all of the therapists there are competent and caring. The wonderful reviews are all genuine and true. I feel so lucky to have easy access to this location.

name: Ashley Grisham
text: TherapySouth saved my ski trip! Last year I had debilitating pain in my right knee which my doctor had diagnosed as arthritis. But Hannah at TherapySouth Vestavia was not convinced. She determined that it was muscular and began treating me with manual therapy and dry needling. When I first saw her, I was 6 weeks away from a snow ski trip, so our goal was to get me into a condition to ski without pain. Not only did she do that (my trip was AWESOME) but she gave me tips about stretches and exercises I could do at home. Now my knee is completely pain free! I'm so thankful to TherapySouth for their knowledge, compassion and dedication to patient wellness. I highly recommend this practice.

name: David Powell
text: I selected this location of TherapySouth based on their convenient location.  My treatment there could not have been better.  The entire team was helpful, engaging, and caring.  They helped me get my medical issue under control, equipped me with strategies to continue to manage it, and built relationships at the same time.  If you need physical therapy and want a place that is not only convenient, but also has people that care about you as a person as well as a patient, I’d recommend TherapySouth-Vestavia.

name: Victoria Morrison
text: Great people and excellent care! TherapySouth made physical therapy enjoyable to go to and helped with a speedy recovery getting back to what I love. Would recommend to everyone!

name: Melody Warbington
text: I've been to TherapySouth (Vestavia) several times in the last 2-3 years due to knee and shoulder issues, and most recently saw Hannah Cox for my knee after a fall. A few sessions later, and the twinge and pain is gone. Then, I saw Hannah with the hope that a few sessions would delay getting frozen shoulder again, or at least put off getting a shot from my ortho until it had been a year. Therapy + dry needling worked wonders. Hannah and the entire staff are professional, friendly, and they worked hard to make me feel relaxed even when working through the pain, stiffness, and soreness I was experiencing. If you need therapy, this is the place to go!

name: Kaleb Reid
text: Very friendly and knowledgeable staff!  These guys know how to make you feel comfortable, and do a great job to get you back on your feet.  I love these guys!

name: Angie Kelly
text: Amazing group of excellent therapists with outstanding customer service.

name: Judy Ault
text: A word of advice - ask how quickly you can learn to do exercises at home and ask how much your physical therapy will cost.  My husband went to Therapy South.  Had he known the expense, two sessions would have done the trick.  The billing has been a mess also.  We won't be back.

name: Penny Haft
text: Great people, excellent care.  More than pleased couldn't imagine a more professional group.

resp.text: Thank you Penny! Thought about you today when I saw your Panda Bear. I hope you are well!

name: Brian Sponder
text: Excellent care, thank you!

name: Stacie Willis
text: I went there and it really was like no one cared about me but only getting their money I had been through so much before I got there I was abused by my boyfriend and abandoned by my own family not to mention I was on drugs ,I had a roommate that was stealing from the center and they punished me not her I had the worst client rep she only cared about the ones who had money.. I left the center and got clean all on my own without their help I mean I tried to ask for help no one wanted to hear my story Brenda just ignored my cry for real help I never relapsed the whole time I was there.. I’d never refer someone to that money making place they don’t care about you only the money....

name: Mandy Armitage
text: I have never met 2 women that have hearts as big and genuine as Mrs. Brenda and Mrs. Malinda... The Lovelady Center changed my life and gave me all the tools to utilize out in the world to remain sober and drug free. My relationship with my kids has been restored and I now have a handsome grandson that I am able to spend lots of time with. Had I not went to The Lovelady Center there is no telling if I would even still be alive. Thank you so much for all that you have done for me Mrs. Brenda and Mrs. Malinda. I am now a much stronger, happier, independent woman and I was able to become this woman with the help that The Lovelady Center gave me. This a picture of my most handsome and wonderful grandson. Thank you Lord for The Lovelady Center!!

name: Angela Edwards
text: Man, this place is so amazing!! Everyone is just so nice here, and they love u so much... This place has taught me how to live life without drugs. I learned how to love myself ❤️ I wouldn't wanna be anywhere else. We're one big family, here at the lovelady center it doesn't matter where you come from, They take you in and treat you like family, they even let you have your sweet babies here . We have a church and a kid zone . Transportation and walmart trips 👌🏼 , Im currently in phase 4 of 5 . I'll be forever thankful for the lovelady and staff . N the best part is they are christian based ✝️🙌🏼

name: Gabriel Bruzzi
text: My daughter has some mental issues and addictive drug issues as well. She had been there years ago for what she was going thru back then. They took her back again with open arms as she is going thru allot now. They called me to let me know she got there ok from Amtrak as they picked her up. I pray and hope she gets the help that they can provide for her. Having the word of God is such great help as well.

name: Michael Ganey
text: From Hevan was sent the lady's running the love lady center. They have saved and changed my wife's life. And with the power of God backing the ladies, nothing can stop them. God Bless you all. Thank You !!!!!

name: Jessica Kuerner
text: We scheduled a donation pickup and they called the day before to confirm, but then never showed up!  For several days we had to haul it out to the driveway and then haul it back in so it wouldn't get rained on, and they were so rude on the phone when we tried to confirm they were ever going to come get it!  Why bother calling us the day before and then not show up?  Luckily there are many other organizations in Birmingham that are responsive and grateful for donations, like The Exchange Club!

name: David Melton
text: What a load this place is. I cant recommend using Lovelady to make donations. They’ll call and tell you a truck will be in your area accepting donations for pickup but then they never show up. Then they’ll call you to reschedule, but they still won’t show up. I had several boxes of my mother’s clothes waiting outside for six days for them to pick up. When they finally did show, they picked up a couple small items and left everything else with a note saying they I needed to call again to reschedule. Only problem is, the next few days rain was expected so I had to haul everything back into the house. I’ve called several times since then and they won’t answer, ignore my calls, or send me to voicemail. So exhausting dealing with them. It’s almost like they get off on stringing me along but I’m not gonna beg them to come pick up my stuff. They should be the ones asking me. Oh wait, that’s right they did ask me when they called in the first place. Yeah, right. Good luck with that. I wanted to donate my mother’s clothing. She passed a way a few month’s ago and would have wanted it that way. But I can’t deal with the ineptitude, incompetence, and unreliability of Lovelady.

name: Steph Casey
text: Tonia Silas do you not understand what it means to work for your room and board?  Tell me where on Earth (other than jail) that you can go live for free? It is a shame that you are not the first person to come to the Lovelady with that attitude and you probably won't be the last. I've got news for you though; until you get real about living a productive life, supporting yourself and not blaming everyone else for all of your problems your life is not gonna change. There are many people in this world that do not care about you, your circumstances or your salvation, but Miss Brenda and Miss Melinda actually do.

name: Stephanie Casey
text: I love the Lovelady! I am grateful that this place exists to help people like myself. I am disappointed to hear people badmouth this place when there are such good people doing their best to cater to our every need. We need a place to stay? We got it. A soft, warm bed? We got it. Food to eat? We've got it. Clothing? We got it. Someone to talk to? (in the form of amazing counselors and client reps)-we've got it. Transportation? We've got it. Healthcare services? We've got it. Family legal assistance? We've got it. Stop complaining! I'm a firm believer that we are a family-a family of survivors...and a family in Christ. Stop talking bad about my family!

name: Dennis Turnbaugh
text: First of all I need to apologize to Ms. Brenda and Ms. Melinda for the review I posted 11 months ago! My wife graduated from TLC in January 2018. When she arrived April 2017 she was pregnant, and broken. She was sent on a court order which infuriated me. Neither of us realized how badly she needed to go to The Lovelady! My 2 children went there to live with her in June 2017, and our 3rd baby arrived August 2017. Had she not gone to TLC, she wouldn't have learned to live first for God and the rest would fall into place, nor would I. Even after moving out of the center they are still there for her, they're there for us! The people are amazing people of God and are an amazing support system!! They're still our family and friends and to be honest, we've never known friends, love, and support the way they've shown to our family! God knows what he's doing, and he sent my wife there for a reason. Had he not, I don't know where my family would be today. Many thanks and much love to all of the folks at The Lovelady Center!

name: Leah Logan
text: I love it here!

name: Brenda Sullivan
text: MY NAME IS BRENDA SULLIVAN McCLENEY AND I WAS SENT TO THE LOVE LADY CENTER BY THE STATE OF ALABAMA ON THE SUPERVISED RELEASE PROGRAM WHERE I SPENT MY LAST 9 MONTHS OF INCARCERATION THERE.. I MUST ADMIT THAT WHEN I FIRST ARRIVED IT WAS VERY OVERWHELMING...AFTER SPENDING SOME TIME WITH THE AMAZING PEOPLE THAT OWN AND RUN THE LOVE LADY THE OVERWHELMING FEELING THAT I HAD WAS REPLACED WITH THE FEELING OF PEACE AND MY WHOLE LIFE HAS BEEN CHANGED BECAUSE OF THIS PLACE!!!MRS BRENDA,,MRS MALINDA AND MY BEAUTIFUL CLIENT REP MRS TAMMY PORTER SHOWED ME MORE LOVE THAN I COULD EVER HAVE IMAGINED AND MADE ME WANT TO BE A BETTER PERSON!! THIS PLACE HAS TAKEN ME FROM PRISONER TO PRINCESS AND I THANK GOD FOR THE OPPORTUNITY TO BE ONE OF MRS BRENDAS MANY LOVE LADY SUCCESS STORIES...

name: Kayla Brown
text: I as well as my daughter lived at the Lovelady center as I went through the program! If a person wants a new life the opportunity is there! Mrs Brenda, Melinda and the rest of the staff were always there to help! My daughter enjoyed the time there as she got to make friends and play as I sometimes worked in the Education and Kids zone! I would recommend this place to anyone seeking second chances and a sober life! Most of all they offer HOPE and LOVE as well as support!!! Assisted me in my court cases and even today I stand strong and sober without my Gods love my will and their “whole-way house” I would not be where I am today! Thanks Mrs Brendan and Melinda for having that vision where women in need may get that last chance to live and have a free life!

name: Joseph Willingham
text: Amazing place! This place brings women and children to God and sobriety.  To me that is sacred grounds. Addiction is the filthiest place on Earth and i hear people on here talking about dirty rugs.This is spiritual boot camp not the Hilton. if you have a problem with the rugs or playground then go volunteer. Otherwise just sit back and watch the miracle of God"s work. This is a huge opportunity for someone that is willing to put forth the work of learning to have a better life.

name: Amanda Whitman
text: I have no clue who R is but I am a Lovelady and they have never charged me or my family for my meds.

name: joni rogers
text: God favors this place 🙌 my life was changed, giving thanks to all who answered God's calling, I've seen restoration, healing and pure worship.

name: Susan Lay
text: I was a resident from December 2006 thru June 2007 ... graduated the program and under the supervision of Hugh Thomas and Ms Brenda I started the Job Placement department.  My name was Susan Edgil at the time.  After graduating I continued to live on the 4th floor working on into 2008... I believe I left in March 2008. They provide EVERYTHING NEEDED TO PREPARE TO LIVE YOUR LIFE CLEAN AND SOBER... BUT YOU HAVE TO WANT IT.  IM STILL CLEAN AND SOBER...13 YEARS AND COUNTING!

name: Ashley Head
text: This place has been absolutely  amazing and has already began to work miracles and restoration in my life and with my children from broken to blessed this program truly works if you are ready for a life change and are ready to make that commitment  for yourself then this is definitely  the place to be everyone here is so full of love and support.

name: Jennifer Creech
text: Wonderful place and people. Changing lives daily

name: Christina Keener
text: Loved this place!  Great people and wonderful staff that helped me so much!  Mrs. Brenda will always have a special place in my heart for all that she did for me!!!! 💜💜💜💜

name: Tom Dooley
text: As a volunteer on the pastoral team I've witnessed first-hand this amazing "whole-way house" holistic program.  Each week I speak with dozens of women who are being transformed from addicts and incarcerated individuals into precious Loveladies.  This is an exemplary faith-based recovery center.  ti works.

name: Maranda&Paul Godwin
text: My name is Maranda Harville. I was incarcerated in 2011, 2012 for drug related problems. My life was great BUT I didnt know it! I've been reading what some of the ladies have said about this place so I decided to tell my story!!! THANK GOD! THAT I WAS SENT HERE. My community corrections officer an my mom an dad found this place for me. I was afraid an overwhelmed just like a few others, in the beginning! Not completely knowing what to expect an being away from everything and everyone I knew. That was key tho, an very soon into my journey I would find this out. The date that I am writing this is May2nd2019 an I have been COMPLETELY 100% clean an sober since the day i walked out of this place. 1st an foremost it takes a desire to change. 2nd it takes help. An 3rd it takes a higher power! Speaking for myself and only myself I found all of these things here at THE LOVELADY! God has always been a huge part of my life BUT I refound Him here. You see even tho He never left me I NOT ONLY LOST MYSELF IN MY ADDICTION I LOST HIM. An IN RECOVER YOU HAVE TO HAVE A HIGHER POWER!!! I choose for mine to be God! Mrs.Brenda, Mrs.Melinda, Ms.Brandi, an i definitely cant forget Pastor Lesley an Pastor Mullins! An so many more from admin to exit! I cant say enough good about them all. All of them have made it possible for females like me to learn how to live again. Of course there is some bad BUT all in all it was a great experience FOR ME! I was reading a post from a Ms.Silas an I completely disagree. The foodstamp stuff and the thrift store stuff is completely untrue! This program is Blessed, The Hand of God is on this place because they do so much good! There was a store where you could treat yourself an they do take foodstamps for your convenience. They do try an get you back out into the working world BUT IF YOU HAVE ISSUES THEN YOU CAN WORK WITHING THE FACILITY! Ms.Silas failed to tell you how you do schooling you can have your children here, they can go to school as well. So many good things an I will stand firm on this!!! THANK YOU LOVELADY CENTER! TO ALL WHO WERE THSRE WHEN I WAS THERE AN TO ALL WHO ARE THERE STILL AN NOW... CONTINUE TO DO WHAT YOU DO!!! IF WE WANT CHANGE IT CAN BE FOUND HERE!!!

name: Cindy Isaacs
text: I have watched miracle after miracle turn women's lives around.  This establishment is great for any woman that wants to turn her life around.

name: Kimberly Pickron
text: This place is truly God's house.. Amazing

name: Lisa
text: I have learned who I was..who I am and who i will become! This place has changed my life and the people here have become my family!

name: Rani Chapman
text: There are pros and cons. Some good programs offered. But the mold and mildew make even the staff sick.I called the health dept to no avail. I called the state rep for that area and within an hour my dau. -in-law was kicked out for an offense that wasn't proven.The food is mostly donated expired food that isn't safe to eat.  And they get and keep 100% of each girls food stamps. Item donated  are then sold to the girls. And they charge family members for drugs paid for by medicaid and medicare.

name: shirley mccord
text: I called the Center last week to report a problem with a patient. The operator said she would have someone call me and I could tell her what happened. The return call never came. I have been a supporter for this center for years, am a christian countsler for girls with hurts and hang ups. This is very disappointing to me since this young lady has been in several faclities  including Love lady several time.

name: Lily Roberson
text: This place helped me and my mom develop a better relationship and it helped her with responsibility and a lot more

name: Laura Diane Bailey
text:
They helped my sister Karen brewer ,she is now drug and alcohol free, Thanks for all your help and support that you all did for her,GOD BLESS THE LOVELY LADIES CENTER,
THANK YOU,LAURA BAILEY

name: Lisa Hester
text: Miss Brenda and her loveladies helped my sister become free from her addictions and got her to start believing in God, trusting in Him and following His ways! I will be forever grateful to this center for changing a woman we thought would never change. I pray nothing but the best for your success in helping the lost become found and changing the worst into the best! Thank you so much to all the loveladies at the Lovelady Center in Birmingham AL.

name: Steve Pruett
text:
Lady at the desk was cold and non-receptive..
Dis not have any ideas how to help us with a family member.
They wanted $ up front (non-refundable) if our relative runs 2 days in, we lose it all!!
No acceptance letter or contract until theu get $...
We will go else where.
Oh btw, ive I've served in ministries helping people with addictions for many years.  I was sad to see such a cold lady to talk to!!

name: Sheena King
text: I love this place because this is where i found what ive been searching for....GOD

name: Susan McDonald
text: GOD TRULY TRANSFORMS AT THE LOVELADY CENTER!! THANK U GOD FOR THE LOVELADY CENTER!!

name: Janet Caldwell
text: From visiting this place and observing it is a hazard and the poor kids that are there having to live in there is horriable who would put children with over 400 drug addicts coming in off the streets they get there cash assistance a d food stamps from these kids I hope it gets shut down or at least the kids will get taken out of there

name: Nelta Cox
text: Save my life! Tks miss Brenda spann for answering gods calling:)

name: Brenda Kirksey
text: Awesome place to be I was there in 2010-2011. I'm going back there tomorrow

name: Jerry Ippolito
text: //////Gynarchy now!

name: Zerlinda Armes
text:
This month I am completing my 7th year at Signature Healthcare of Whitesburg Gardens. As the Business Office Manager, it is my pleasure to be a go-to-person to our residents and family.  I assist in navigating the deep sea of Alabama Medicaid for those who need to transition to long term care. I am thorough in helping to address any issues that may hinder Medicaid eligibility.

Since I have been a member of the team, I have enjoyed working with amazing people.  From the nurses and CNAs, to the adminstration, dietary, and housekeeping, these people work.  We have a CEO who believes in urgency, and you don't find that everywhere.  I have grown professionally, personally, and spiritually in my time at Signature Healthcare of Whitesburg Gardens.  We are here to serve.

resp.text: Hello Zerlinda! We’re so happy you joined the Signature family! You are a great team member and we value your dedication and compassion! – Sincerely, Signature HealthCARE

name: Dennis Buck
text: There is no way to give a negative star or I  I would. My mom is a resident there this has to be the worst nursing home in not only the state of Alabama... but possibly anywhere.   As of this post my mom....94 years old....with COPD... congestive heart failure and an A fib pacemaker as a few of her issues was diagnosises Sat 8/29 with COVID 19.  She is luckily finally on her way to the ER as of Monday night about 6 pm.  This is in no thanks to anyone at Whitesburg. The absolute lack of any protocol to make sure someone in her condition is ssen by a PA or doctor is just the tip of the iceberg. During conversation today with the RN of the Covid ward she stated no we can't have her seen by anyone as our process is to give Tylonol if her temp continues to rise. The simple fact that the Covid in this facility is being spread by the staff is the only explanation.  The place has been locked down and no visitors could possibly get in.  The list of issues goes on and on and on.   They will probably remove it but if you want more info, email me at dbuckretired@aol.com.  If you are thinking of this place and can run away....do so...If your family member is a patient here...I will pray for them.....

resp.text: Hello Dennis. Thank you for taking the time to review us, and please know that we value your feedback. We are committed to serving our residents and their families with compassion, dedication, and commitment for the utmost safety of all. If you would like to discuss your concerns further, we would like to hear from you.  Please contact our anonymous CAREline at (888) 392-8886 or via www.ltcrevolution.ethicspoint.com. – Sincerely, Signature HealthCARE

name: Nakesha Lemons
text: I've had the pleasure of working with these folks for about 8 years and I can't think of a better crew. They are truly my family and I admire how passionate they are about caring for our patients. Loving the Whitesburg family!

resp.text: Nakesha, it is a pleasure having you part of the Signature family! Thanks for taking the time to review us! Sincerely - Signature HealthCARE

name: Kurt W
text:
My mother was in the facility for about a month in June 2015. The folks in the rehab department seemed earnest in their effort and my mother actually thought they were very nice. The doctor/nursing aspect is a totally different matter that seems to operate on providing the minimal care and effort.  If you have a loved one at this facility, you need to pay attention to the needs of your family member.  When I noticed fungal growth on my mother's hand, I called it out.  The nurse told me that the doctor determined it to be a callous. They then promised they would apply fungal cream. I left on business for two weeks and when I returned, her entire hand was covered is what appeared as crusted skin and had spread to her other hand and face.  Only after I raised it to their attention did they start to address the situation. I mean no one seems to have noticed it before this?   It turned out to be scabies which means that she required isolation and likely infected other in the facility.

There were a few other matters such as trash on the floor of her room, the fact they couldn't hang up her clothes, and that when they put her on an air mattress, they shoved the other mattress into the bathroom preventing any access to the bathroom.

A few days later, she fell out of bed. Supposedly she slid off of the air mattress.   They sent her to the emergency room for precaution.  Although she sustained no injuries, the hospital kept my mother as she had a bacterial infection causing her white blood count to be extremely high.

The management staff was nice, and the rehab people seemed genuinely engaged.  Some of the nursing staff were conscientious but to ignore a situation that was clearly out of control and in need of medical attention is inexcusable.

name: House of Big John
text: They healed my father and then some. He arrived ill from Pneumonia and was helpless, unable to lift his head. (near death to be truthful) In 90 days he walked out of there healed. I observed the staff many times caring for the patients just as I would want to be treated, with love and care. The rehab staff, the nurses and care takers are all seemingly caring people. My dad didn't care for the meals at times but it goes that way when you don't get to pick what you get for dinner. They always tried to accommodate him and have the kitchen make him something different. The director was a professional and put us at ease in our first visit with her. I would recommend it to your family based upon my experience there.

name: Nancy Ball
text: The CNAs don’t treat the residents with respect.  I heard one tell a resident in a wheelchair to get her big a$$ out of the way.  Several of my relative’s belongings have been stolen and her clothes just disappear.  The place smells awful the majority of the time I’ve visited and they seem to be short staffed on weekends.

resp.text: Nancy, Thank you for bringing these issues to our attention. We strive to make our residents our top priority every day and deliver the highest quality of care available.  Our Careline advisors would like to personally talk with you about your experience, will you share with us the best  way to contact you? You can also contact our Signature Careline advisors directly at (888) 392-8886. Sincerely - Signature HealthCARE of Whitesburg Gardens

name: Kelly Wells
text: Never allow a loved one to go here!  I Called 911 to have my Mother rushed to Huntsville Hospital emergency room today.  Doctors found her seriously malnourished with multiple open wounds, serious bacterial infections, urinary tract infection, and infiltration pneumonia.  They are still doing tests.  I was told by a WG staff member that they run out of critical medical supplies on a regular basis because they can’t pay their bills.  Only the Nursing Director has the key to the Supply Closet.  I checked with the State of Alabama and they have Tax Liens as well. The Department of Justice announced on June 8, 2018 that Signature Healthcare defrauded Medicare and Medicaid of $244M and were only able to pay back $30M.  Dr Michael K Johnson is the Medical Director and the only Doctor for 159 residents.  My mother has lived there 5 years and I’ve only seen him in the building once.  He doesn’t show up for rounds and operates his own Medical Practice at another location in addition to being the Medical Director for North Alabama Hospice who the Nursing Hope Recommends to patients who don’t quakify for it!!

resp.text: Kelly, Thank you for reaching out.  We have received and responded to the many inquiries you’ve recently sent us.  If there are additional or new concerns, please contact the specific persons at the phone numbers we provided to you.  Our team is happy to personally discuss your experience. Sincerely - Signature HealthCARE of Whitesburg Gardens

text: I am proud to work for such a wonderful company!!

resp.text: Donna, we are proud to have you on our team and part of the Signature family! Thank you for all that you do to serve our residents and their families. - Sincerely, Signature HealthCARE

name: Lynn Sanders
text:
My mother'n law has been in the care of the wonderful staff at Whitesburg  Gardens for the past two weeks.  From day one I have been impressed and amazed at the level of care she has received.  Mary is 90 years old and in very good health.  Up until her fall, on November 7, 2013, she and her 93 year old husband had been living in their home with the help of a care giver who was with them during the day. ( 8 a.m. - 4 p.m. )  On the evening of Nov. 7th Mary fell and broke her pelvis.  Her GP doctor put her on pain meds and sent her home.  We arranged for 24/7 care for her at home, but within a week after her fall she became listless and stopped eating, sleeping and dehydration was setting in.  An ambulance ride to Crestwood Hospital ER was arranged & she was admitted for 3 days/nights of intensive care to bring her pain under control & getting her back to eating and sleeping normally again.  The admitting Dr. recommended The Kindred Transitional Care & Rehabilitation Center quite highly.

From the first moment I walked into Whitesburg Gardens until this evening, two weeks later, I have felt completely at peace with our decision to have Mary under the care of the caring folks at this rehabilitation facility.  The atmosphere is so positive, and the entire staff works together as a team so completely, that any worry I might have had when Mary was placed in this rehab center has completely vanished.  I've observed a delightful group of caring people who are truly committed to the rehabilitation & attaining the goal of giving their patients their lives back, no matter what age or disability they have upon their admittance to the facility.

During the course of these past two weeks at Whitesburg Gardens, I have had an education in true compassion, a deliciously keen sense of humor expressed by the majority of the staff and a depth of dignity shown to the men and women who are going through a positive rehabilitation while on their journey back to living the lives they want to live.

Kudos all around!

I wish to express my sincere thanks to everyone who works at Whitesburg Gardens.

Lynn Sanders

Very
Nice with caring attitude.

name: Fallon Johnson

name: Margaret Madison
text: The entire staff is awesome!!  So friendly everyone is always smiling and very helpful.  Jonathan, Aston & Bo & the entire staff really have helped me get back to my exercise routine which is very vital to me.  They push me each visit and I push myself!!  I am very grateful!!  They are very professional and know how to get you moving the correct way!!  I cannot tell you how much that means to me!!  Thanks again!!

name: Jerry Ross
text: My second time to be treated at Therapy South (shoulder first and back this time) and I couldn’t be more pleased with the results.   Problems corrected with no surgery and no drugs and that was my goal.   Wonderful, knowledgeable staff that makes you feel so welcome.   I highly recommend Therapy South based on me experience.

name: Joyce Parker
text: I did 6 weeks of therapy for pain in my back, which had been bothering me  for 8 months. All the therapists who worked with me were informative and helpful, and very patient. The atmosphere at Chelsea is calm and relaxing. I highly recommend TherapySouth Chelsea.  My pain is 99% better!

name: Danielle Gardner
text: I have known Robbie since my daughter went to him for many knee & ankle issues as a competitive athlete. Then came me with multiple issues with my ankle, leg, and hip issues. Robbie truly takes time consulting with his patients and getting them back to their daily tasks. With my multiple sclerosis and falls, I needed help getting me stable again. It took a long time and still going to him as needed, but he gives you the individual time you need. When he isn't there, he makes sure that he places you with another PT that can give you the skills & exercises that you need. Also, he helps you to have exercises thru Therapy South online portal when you are done with your therapy sessions to make sure you are continuing improving at home. That is definitely a good source for any patient. I' &m very blessed to have such good health care outside of the hospital.

name: Joan Garrett
text: I’ve been to other therapists, but the therapists at Therapy South are by far the best. They know their stuff, but they’re also friendly and fun to be around.  You’ll definitely feel better after working with them.

name: Kelly O'Neil
text: I highly recommend TherapySouth Chelsea. Bo and his team were very professional and helpful to my knee problem. Everyone I worked with was so nice and personable, at the same time, was very knowledgeable and helpful. If I should ever need any type of physical therapy in the future I will definitely be returning to TherapySouth Chelsea. Thank you so much for the excellent care I received, and for restoring my strength in my knee to fully recover from my previous surgery!

name: David Patterson
text: Following my left knee replacement surgery on December 22, 2020, I chose Therapy South in Chelsea for my physical therapy.  I based my decision on the convenience to my home.  I was very pleased with the professional care I received from my therapist Bo Dawson.  I steadily progressed with  his hands on skills and goals he set for me.   He communicated with me and made sure I understood what outcome I could achieve.  I plan to use Bo or one of the other therapist when I I follow thru on my right knee replacement surgery.

name: Tony Wheeler
text: I highly recommend this clinic!  They are such a great group of people. Bo Dawson was my therapist for the last year but I have worked closely with all of them. As a team, they helped me recover through the most traumatic experience of my life. Bo, Nathan, JB, Robbie, and everyone else... thank you all, for everything!

name: Janet O
text: Although needing physical therapy is not a pleasant situation, the staff here are wonderful and I can’t say one negative thing about my experience with them. JB was my main therapist and he was always pleasant, professional, and encouraging. All the staff are so helpful and I am glad I chose Therapy South Chelsea. If I ever need PT again, I will definitely go back to them.

name: Michael Seymour
text: TherapySouth Chelsea has an amazing staff! They are all very friendly, knowledgable, and hardworking! You can tell they truly care about their clients and want them to get better, not just linger in perpetual therapy. They make you feel like a part of the family, not a patient or customer.

name: Paula Davis
text: Friendly, knowledgeable staff. They were a pleasure to work with and my son recovered quickly. Would definitely use again!!

name: Greg Jordan
text: These guys are great. Caring, professional and very helpful. This is the third time I have used their services. I highly recommend.

name: Dave Urech
text: Very clean.  Knowledgeable and caring staff that makes it a bit fun!

name: Matt Mason
text: The staff are knowledgeable and extremely personable. They ask good questions, explain how the body is working or why it's not working so well, and how to get you moving in the right direction. If you like, they'll print out exercises so you don't forget any home workouts that they encourage you to maintain. They're even on the ball administratively and do a great job helping you schedule your visits. I don't normally write online reviews but they really are the total package. I wrote this as a small thank you for the great experience I've had.

name: Alex ellison
text: I am beyond impressed with my experience at therapy south and with my PT Bo. I was sent there with some strange symptoms post c-section. It turns out my issue was not physical therapy related but Bo called my physician to make sure I was seen immediately. He has since followed up twice to check on my progress. I really appreciate the extra care this team takes especially since I was only in need of an evaluation.

name: Tanya Adams
text: I highly recommend TherapySouth. They are a very caring staff!!! They do a great job!!! Thank you soo much for helping me!!!!

name: Monica Steelreath
text: I had a great experience at TherapySouth in Chelsea, AL. The Physical Therapists and Assistants were all professional and nice. I had a total knee replacement and I felt that the staff had an interest in my healing process. Hannah always greeted me with a smile. Nathan and Abby adjusted my needs for a speedy recovery. I would definitely recommend TherapySouth Chelsea for your Physical Therapy needs.

name: Seth Boman
text: Friendly staff! Highly recommend!

name: Shirley Robinson
text: The treatment and care I received at Therapy  South in Chelsea after a total knee replacement was excellent.  All personnel  were friendly and  caring.  Special  thanks to   Mitchell  as he worked  more  closely with my  treatment.  I  would  definitely  recommend  this facility  for your  physical  therapy.

name: Myra Shaw
text: I am so appreciative and thankful for the support I received at Therapy South! I was always greeted by my name and with a smile from Hannah! Nathan, my therapist was not only knowledgeable but supportive and encouraging as I worked to get back “back to walking on two feet”. If I ever need PT again, I will be sure to go back to Therapy South!

name: Ariana Mejia
text: My experience with everyone at TherapySouth Chelsea was absolutely amazing. My physical therapist was Bo, and I really appreciate how knowledgeable and personable he was. I highly recommend TherapySouth Chelsea!

name: Rodney Perkins
text: I had the greatest experience at the Chelsea, Al Therapy South location. Nathan and Bo are what  true customer service is like, these therapists not only got me going again they made my visits a dream. I strongly recommend these guys if anyone needs physical therapy. 👍🏽👍🏽👍🏽👍🏽👍🏽

name: Pat Thienpont
text: Therapy South is clean and all the people I have come in contact with are very nice and professional. I have already recommended them to several of my friend’s.

name: Pat Lonvworth
text:
TherapySouth Chelsea and Robby Head are top of the line!  Robby is very professional.  He  helped me during my recovery from hip replacement surgery.  With his caring guidance and mastery of his profession (he has his Doctorate in Physical Therapy and over a decade of experience), I regained my strength, balance, and agility.

I have already recommended Robby to a friend who also had hip replacement surgery.  That friend agrees with my assessment of Robby.  She is very happy with his service.  She in turn recommended her husband who suffers with back issues to Robby.  All three of us are so happy to work with Robby.

Robby is a young man of high character, professionalism, and wisdom.

Pat Longworth Krauser

name: William Chesser (Kenny)
text: Everyone there are knowledgeable and there is no wait time for appointments

name: Elisabeth O'Dell
text: Awesome place for physical therapy! Everyone has the knowledge, expertise, support and guidance to help you through the rehabilitation process....I know, I was a patient and ALL of the staff helped make my recovery a hard, but extremely wonderful experience!! Came in with a walker and left walking on my own two feet. Many thanks and extremely grateful for all of their help and support, especially my PT Bo Dawson!!! They ROCK!

resp.text: Thank you Elisabeth! I'm glad you are doing so much better!

name: Phyllis Mayfield
text: The PTs and assistants are all friendly and professional.  They take a personal interest in the clients.  The facility is clean and they follow the state guidelines for COVID-19.  Nathan, the therapist working directly with me is very knowledgeable and exhibits a true desire for me to improve.

name: Roy Coffey
text: Thank you to all the staff at Therapy South, I am very pleased with my care. Thank you Bo for your exceptional knowledge of what needed to be done so I could avoid knee surgery. Thank you also for be a very kind young man,  I am very grateful. I highly recommend Therapy South, all the staff were very caring and knowledgeable. Martha Coffey

name: Jeffrey Chick
text: Professional, personable, and friendly, showing me great care and concern. And, best of all, Bo got my shoulder straightened out! The exercises he gave me to do at home were very effective! I will be taking all of my future PT needs to Therapy South!

name: Lena Davis
text: I highly recommend Therapy South in Chelsea. The staff is friendly, knowledgeable and caring. When I arrived for each appointment, I was asked how my ankle felt, any issues I was having and then I was told what was going to be done that day for therapy. My therapist Bo Dawson was super to work with!

resp.text: Thank you Lena! We really enjoy getting to know each of our patients and creating a plan that will help our patients achieve their personalized goals!

name: Geneva Talmadge
text: I actually ate at Joseph's table and loved it

name: Danny Cox
text: What I liked most was the constant attention and the one on one care I received. They stayed on top of my progress and showed attention to detail. If and when I need therapy care I will return to TherapySouth Chelsea for that care.

name: Pat and Emily Dubay
text:
My experience at Therapy South Chelsea was with Bo, Nathan and Mandy.  They were all great to work with and very professional and helped me out tremendously.  The facility is very nice and clean.
I really appreciate them getting me on the road to feeling better.

resp.text: Thank you Pat and Emily for your kind words! We love seeing our patients get back to doing the things they love!

name: C Kiser
text: Following full ankle reconstruction, a tendon graft and heel re-positioning, Therapy South and my primary therapist, Bo Dawson, did a fantastic job of helping me regain my range of motion, flexibility and function. I have used Robby Head's team at the Chelsea location on several occasions over the years and was satisfied each and every time. Highly recommend them!

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words! I'm glad you are doing so well!

name: Robbie Kirk
text: Caring and personable staff. Patient-centered treatment plan, not just a standardized generic approach. Therapists are constantly researching and learning new innovative methods, especially their occupational hand therapists. I had an unusually difficult tendon repair on my left hand. Three total surgeries due to severed tendon, subsequent rupture, then finally a bizarre autoimmune rejection of the deep tissue stitches. These folks never gave up! They researched ideas to help me improve my flexion and thanks to their efforts, I have finally regained my ability to play the guitar. I will forever be indebted!

name: Ann Limbach
text: When I first struggled to get out of the car for my first PT appointment and my therapist, Bo Dawson, came to help me get out of the car, I thought my total hip rehab was going to be a long difficult process.  Now, 8 weeks post surgery, I am walking normally without even a cane!  My treatment was individualized and personal with achievable challenges and goals injected with humor to relieve any stress.  I saw this happening with other patients as well and the smiles were infectious!  Recovery from surgery is not easy but the team at Therapy South Chelsea makes it a positive, achievable experience!!

resp.text: Thanks Ann! We love serving the people in the Chelsea area!

name: Ron Owen
text: I was very pleased with the attention and care received from the staff that worked with me (Bo, Nathan and Abby).  They all are very knowledgeable and helpful.  Bo's plan of action really helped and the home exercises are simple and should keep the progress that has been made!  I highly recommend TherapySouth CHELSEA.  This was actually my 2nd series of visits... The 2nd issue was a doctor referral in hopes to delay or avoid the need for a knee replacement.  When PT was suggested, I requested TherapySouth CHELSEA because of the care that I received before, not to mention the location for me is absolutely perfect!

name: Ronnie Nabors
text: TherapySouthChelsea made my recovery so easy it almost seems like it never happened. I destroyed my shoulder and had a lot of repair work on it. The professionals here are all caring, and great at their job, I had the pleasure of working with them all over the 3 months of rehab. I used to joke they had to draw straws to see who got stuck with me LOL. If knowing that someone cares about you as well as your healing, this is where you need to be. Thanks again to all my friends there, may you be well.

resp.text: Thank you Ronnie! I'm glad your experience was such a good one!

name: Robert Craig
text: Everyone at Therapy South in Chelsea has been wonderful!  My primary Therapist has been great!  She makes sure I accomplish all the stretches and pulls I need get these muscles back in shape.  Amanda Spalding has lots of experience and will work you over as you improve. Great group!

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words Robert!

name: Fred Kendrick
text: Therapy South Chelsea was amazing with my Physical Therapy / Recovery from Total Knee Replacement.  Robby and his entire staff did a phenomenal job from getting my range of motion back to all the strength training.  Very grateful for all of there hard work and support for their patients.

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words Fred! Glad you are doing so well!

name: John McPherson
text:
My experience at Therapy South was excellent. Amanda’s (my PT)  knowledge of the problem and solution produced almost immediate relief. The scheduled treatments went well with a clear plan until complete recovery was accomplish. The staff and other employees were always courteous and helpful.
- John

resp.text: Thank you John! Thankful you are back to doing the things you love to do!

name: Paula Tolbert
text: Therapy South is an excellent provider and work with each client to meet each specific need.  The physical therapists truly care for the clients by listening - really listening and taking time to understand what issue needs to be dealt with.  They then create individualized plans that will improve the clients issues.  I highly recommend Therapy South!

resp.text: Thank you Paula! Glad you are doing so well!

name: Jenny Riddle
text: The entire staff is friendly, professional, and truly cares about helping you get better. The atmosphere is cheerful, and I'm always in a better mood when I leave. I have full confidence in all of the therapists abilities, and they've treated my shoulder well. I'm also now a big fan of dry needling, when it can help! They are like physical magicians :)

resp.text: Thanks for your kind words Jenny! We love our patients and love seeing them achieve their goals!

name: Matt Jons
text: The crew at Therapy South Chelsea is fantastic. I would recommend anyone needing PT that lives in the Chelsea area, to go here if you want the very best recovery and overall experience. I had a serious injury & surgery and am very active in life sports. The staff knew they had to get me back in peak shape so I would be able to compete and enjoy sports again. I want to give a special thanks to Erick for helping me get thru this process. It was not easy, but he knew what I needed and encouraged me to be patient and assured me that I would achieve a total recovery. Also, the receptionist, Hannah,  is very efficient & pleasant to work with. A business is only as good as their people and their ability to work as a team. This place is A+ in the people & teamwork department.

resp.text: Thank you Matt! We strive to give patients the best quality of life by providing exceptional care while they are with us!

name: Joanne Williamson
text: The team was very professional and knowledgeable. I would recommend them to anyone needing therapy.

resp.text: Thank you Joanne!

name: Donald Slee, Jr
text:
I have chosen Therapy South Chelsea for the second time in two years to provide me with therapy services to assist me with recovery from my second total knee replacement.  My first experience (in February 2016) led me straight back to the team at Therapy South Chelsea in February 2018 for therapy to assist in recovery from my final total knee replacement.
I was very impressed with the level of expertise, quality of service and the professionalism of the Director (Robby Head), Therapists (Abby and Erick) and the Office Administrator, Hannah, who assisted me with "juggling" sometimes last minute appointments due to a difficult work schedule.
Following my surgery, I was quickly put into a program which aided in restoring full mobility and avoided what I have heard is typical "stiffness" due to the formation of scar tissue.
I can recommend, without any hesitation or reservation whatsoever, Therapy South Chelsea as the premier provider of Physical Therapy in our area.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind words Don! We are thankful to have been able to get you going after both of your surgeries.

name: Kris Findlay
text: Very helpful!

name: Billy Studdard
text: The entire staff of Therapy South is both professional and friendly. While the mechanics of rehab may not always be pleasurable the environment in which you rehab can be, Therapy South in Chelsea is a pleasurable place in which to rehab because of the quality of the people who work there. They are professional yet a joy to be around. I would recommend them and will use them again in the future as the need arises.

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words Mr. Studdard! We enjoy working with you!

name: Ryan Jones
text: Definitely had a great experience at this Therapy South location. Robbie was wonderful to work with, as well as all of the other staff that I was fortunate enough to work with. If you need physical therapy in the area, this is THE place to go!

resp.text: Thank you Ryan!

name: Elizabeth Cooley
text: TherapySouth Chelsea is where I would recommend anyone, post-surgery or with chronic pain, to go for physical therapy. The therapist are phenomenal in all areas of their field. They listen and work with you according to what is going on with your body. I've done my physical therapy after ACL replacement surgery and my knee is stronger than it has ever been. I'm currently doing therapy on lower back issues and I'm getting better each day. I've even got my mom going for pain management. This is the place to go for physical therapy. I think of the physical therapist and Hannah, Kelly and Andrew as if they were my family, that is just how much they care. I feel so blessed that they are located in Chelsea, AL.

resp.text: Thank you Elizabeth! You were a pleasure to work with and we are happy to have helped you achieve your goals!

name: Clark Kelley
text: Every one was great and professional

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Ashley Arrowood
text:
My journey with physical therapy began during the most painful time in my life to date.  I never imagined the experience would become so personal.  At my first visit, I met with Robby to discuss all my issues.  He has a genuine nature, a respect for where you are in the process, and a drive to see you return to wellness.  He took the time to evaluate me and was methodical in his design of a plan that worked not only in the clinic but could be transitioned to home. He championed me through tough times with kindness, professionalism, and a warmth that led to a trust which is necessary for the recovery process to be successful.  He is a credit to his profession and an asset to TherapySouth.
Throughout the following weeks, I worked with Abbey.  Abbey is truly a pioneer in her field.  She is focused and attentive during every session, kind, compassionate, knowledgeable, and helpful.  When I was doubtful, she was always there to encourage me, being honest with me about the challenges I would face, yet reassuring me that I would one day be able to return to a life filled with many athletic endeavors.  Abbey is understanding and genuinely takes a personal interest in how you're feeling.  She always made sure to explain every exercise in depth and also how it would aid in my progress going forward.  I feel lucky to have been guided by Abbey along my PT journey, for it was her encouragement that pushed me through when I was at my lowest.
Hannah is also extremely helpful and efficient.  Being the face you see when you first walk in, she is cheerful and always greets the patients by name.  TherapySouth has an amazing team and, more importantly, great teamwork.  It is modern and very nice, clean, and an extremely well-run practice.  I couldn't be happier with my experience with something I wasn't at all looking forward to.
Thank you to the TherapySouth team for always answering my questions with interest and patience.  You guys have truly made my recovery a more pleasant experience.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind words Ashley! I am thankful you are doing so well!

name: charles lewis
text: Love you guys!!

resp.text: Thanks Mr. Lewis! Glad you are doing well!

name: Tina Reed
text: Went with my sister for her inner ear therapy. Very nice people & clean place. Small but effective.

name: Anabeth Ward
text: Everyone there is very friendly and helpful! They are all great at their job and seem to enjoy what they do.

name: Kayley Hartselle
text: Fyzical is without a doubt the best place to go for your physical therapy needs! They are amazing at what they do. Every session is one-on-one and specialized to your needs. They go out of their way to treat you like family. They have worked with four people in my family and we would all HIGHLY recommend them! I can honestly say that I look forward to my physical therapy visits each week!!

name: Julie Pitts
text: This is an amazing place that few people know about! I am going because of an onset of vertigo and this is the place to relearn balance and deal with issues of vertigo. It can help many people with different balance issues. They have safety harnesses that connect to tracks to make sure you will not fall while doing the therapy to get your balance back. If you have a loved one with balance issues this is the place to be.

name: Peggy hughes
text: This is the third time I have needed physical therapy but my first occasion to use Fyzical at Decatur, Alabama. I am so impressed with this facility and is by far the best. Unlike previous places I’ve been, the therapists treat their patients one on one. Therefore I have been able to actually progress and at a faster rate. I actually enjoy my therapy and look forward to it. The therapists I have used are Shawna, Jeff and others. They are consistent in their treatment and always ready to do anything to make sure I’m comfortable. I recommend Fyzical to anyone who needs any type of therapy. They are in the process of helping me wit my balance and are doing a great job!   Peggy Hughes

name: Gail Kritinar
text: Warm, friendly, knowledgeable and a one-on-one PT like you have not seen before. Between my husband and I we have had over a dozen surgeries that have required PT afterward and we both agree that this is the BEST experience we have had! I would not hesitate to recommend them to any friend or family member.

name: Dani Corum
text: Great people! They explain everything to you as they are doing things as well as test results so you are not left in the dark until you talk to your specialists again. Very helpful people.

name: Billy K
text: The best therapist in town and you're with a PT one on one.  Professionals that care about getting you result in a short amount of time without pushing too hard.  Your improvement will keep you coming in and the office environment will make you look forward to being there.

text: Dr. Barnes is fantastic! Always a good experience when I go in. I am a massage therapist and I was having some intense pain in my hand. So much so that I thought I would not work in my profession again. She offered the deep tissue laser and in ONE session my hand was back to 100% and I have had zero problems sense. Also I always feel great when I leave her office after abs adjustment! People say I have magic hands but man she does too!

I am a driver by trade and love fitness. When I started seeing Dr. Barnes I couldn't sit for long periods or squat and deadlift without severe lower back pain. Just a few adjustments later and both of those problems are solved and I'm lifting like normal
💪Also Dr. Barnes finds problem areas on the spot, I don't even have to tell her what new problem there is she just fixes the problem. Great staff too 👍

name: Emilie Francies
text: I've been to chiropractors before and Dr. Barnes is the best I've ever seen.  She is so sweet, professional, and knowledgeable.  She helped me with problems I didn't know chiropractic could help with.

name: Bass Wallace
text: These girls are awesome! I look forward to seeing them every week.  They go out of their way to schedule me in when I miss my scheduled appointments.  I don't know where I would be without them❤️

name: Bekah Schmidt
text:
Amanda is the best chiropractor in Huntsville! Amanda has cared for every member of my family, from my mom, husband, three year old son, and newborn. Amanda is great with kids and my son LOVES visiting "Dr. Amanda". He has no clue he is getting adjusted because he is having so much fun with her. When my husbands back locked up the week of Christmas, Amanda worked him in ASAP despite her holiday schedule. Because of his weekly adjustments, my husband is able to run again, which he hasn't been able to do in years because of his back pain. Amanda also cared for me throughout my pregnancy. I give her credit for my easy delivery! After my daughters birth, she adjusted my newborn and it helped with her colic. You could see the relief in her face after an adjustment.
Amanda's office staff is friendly and she and her staff are constantly going out of their way to provide excellent customer service. Whether it's scheduling an appointment, or needing to bring the kids with me, the staff is always helpful.
One thing that stands out about Amanda's chiropractic care which separates her from other chiropractors, is she is always going to seminars and learning the latest techniques. She is very passionate about what she does and wants to provide the best care possible. If you pick Health Source for your chiropractic care, you will not be disappointed!

name: irwanto fnu
text: Dr. Barnes is amazing and compassionate! She cares about what she does and her patients. The staff creates a very welcoming environment and really care about each patient that comes in. Highly recommend!

name: Katie Venckus
text: Love Dr. Barnes and the HealthSource of Hampton Cove staff! They can treat so many things and I’m always in and out in 30 minutes!

text: Therapy Achievements was alright.  Went there and everything went alright but felt that they were just kind of phoning it in with the therapy. Glad I chose to go to another PT because they didn't do me this way plus they were a lot more active in making sure I got better.

resp.text: Mr. Powell, we are so sorry that you didn't have a better experience.  We have tried to reach out to you a few times over the phone with the number you provided to us during your visits. Feel free to call us at 256-509-4398. Dianne would be happy to speak with you on this matter.

text: Such a nice and profesional group that actually cares  and takes the time to explain and answer questions.  I feel hopeful now knowing what my issues are that no one ever explained to me in the past.  More doctors should use this service and refer their patients.  I look forward to being able to  move  around more without the severe leg pain.

resp.text: Ms. Rainey, we are so happy that your experience here has been positive. We are also thankful that you are finally getting some of the answers to the questions you had. We look forward to working with you more! Thank you for the review!

name: Elizabeth Harrell
text: My son twisted his knee in one of his basketball games, so he went to Therapy Achievements for Therapy . I love everyone there, they are so helpful and nice to everyone. This clinic is on a more of a personal level and I love that. I also love the fact that the therapist answer all of your questions in a way that you can understand. I think the best part about Therapy Achievements is the fact that they offer all different kinds of programs and services, its like a one stop shop!!!!!!!
